```
    76â†’  }, [dailyEntriesJa]);
    77â†’
    78â†’  // å„²å­˜ Jo è³‡æ–™åˆ° localStorage
    79â†’  useEffect(() => {
    80â†’    if (Object.keys(dailyEntriesJo).length > 0) {
    81â†’      localStorage.setItem(PERSON_CONFIG.jo.storageKey, JSON.stringify(dailyEntriesJo));
    82â†’    }
    83â†’  }, [dailyEntriesJo]);
    84â†’
    85â†’  // åˆ‡æ›äººæ™‚é—œé–‰ç·¨è¼¯é¢æ¿
    86â†’  const handlePersonChange = (person: PersonType) => {
    87â†’    setActivePerson(person);
    88â†’    setSelectedDate(null);
    89â†’  };
    90â†’
    91â†’  // è¨ˆç®—ç•¶æœˆè³‡è¨Š
    92â†’  const monthInfo = useMemo(() => {
    93â†’    const year = currentDate.getFullYear();
    94â†’    const month = currentDate.getMonth();
    95â†’    const firstDay = new Date(year, month, 1).getDay();
    96â†’    const daysInMonth = new Date(year, month + 1, 0).getDate();
    97â†’    const monthName = currentDate.toLocaleDateString('zh-TW', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' });
    98â†’    return { year, month, firstDay, daysInMonth, monthName };
    99â†’  }, [currentDate]);
   100â†’
   101â†’  const today = new Date();
   102â†’  const todayStr = `${today.getFullYear()}-${String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}`;
   103â†’
   104â†’  const getDateStr = (day: number) => {
   105â†’    return `${monthInfo.year}-${String(monthInfo.month + 1).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(day).padStart(2, '0')}`;
   106â†’  };
   107â†’
   108â†’  const handlePrevMonth = () => {
   109â†’    setCurrentDate(new Date(currentDate.getFullYear(), currentDate.getMonth() - 1, 1));
   110â†’  };
   111â†’
   112â†’  const handleNextMonth = () => {
   113â†’    setCurrentDate(new Date(currentDate.getFullYear(), currentDate.getMonth() + 1, 1));
   114â†’  };
   115â†’
   116â†’  const handleDayClick = (day: number) => {
   117â†’    const dateStr = getDateStr(day);
   118â†’    setSelectedDate(dateStr);
   119â†’    const entry = dailyEntries[dateStr];
   120â†’    setEditContent(entry?.content || '');
   121â†’    setEditMaterials(entry?.materials || []);
   122â†’    setNewMaterial({ type: 'link', name: '', url: '', note: '', dataUrl: '' });
   123â†’  };
   124â†’
   125â†’  const handleSaveEntry = () => {
   126â†’    if (!selectedDate) return;
   127â†’
   128â†’    const now = new Date().toISOString();
   129â†’    const existingEntry = dailyEntries[selectedDate];
   130â†’
   131â†’    setDailyEntries(prev => ({
   132â†’      ...prev,
   133â†’      [selectedDate]: {
   134â†’        id: existingEntry?.id || Date.now().toString(),
   135â†’        content: editContent,
   136â†’        materials: editMaterials,
   137â†’        createdAt: existingEntry?.createdAt || now,
   138â†’        updatedAt: now
   139â†’      }
   140â†’    }));
   141â†’
   142â†’    setSelectedDate(null);
   143â†’  };
   144â†’
   145â†’  const handleAddMaterial = () => {
   146â†’    if (!newMaterial.name) return;
   147â†’
   148â†’    const material: Material = {
   149â†’      id: Date.now().toString(),
   150â†’      type: newMaterial.type,
   151â†’      name: newMaterial.name,
   152â†’      url: newMaterial.url || undefined,
   153â†’      dataUrl: newMaterial.dataUrl || undefined,
   154â†’      note: newMaterial.note || undefined,
   155â†’    };
   156â†’
   157â†’    setEditMaterials(prev => [...prev, material]);
   158â†’    setNewMaterial({ type: 'link', name: '', url: '', note: '', dataUrl: '' });
   159â†’  };
   160â†’
   161â†’  const handleDeleteMaterial = (materialId: string | number) => {
   162â†’    setEditMaterials(prev => prev.filter(m => m.id !== materialId));
   163â†’  };
   164â†’
   165â†’  const handleFileUpload = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>, type: 'image' | 'file') => {
   166â†’    const file = e.target.files?.[0];
   167â†’    if (!file) return;
   168â†’    if (file.size > 10 * 1024 * 1024) {
   169â†’      alert('æª”æ¡ˆå¤§å°ä¸èƒ½è¶…é 10MB');
   170â†’      return;
   171â†’    }
   172â†’    const reader = new FileReader();
   173â†’    reader.onload = () => {
   174â†’      setNewMaterial(prev => ({
   175â†’        ...prev,
   176â†’        type,
   177â†’        name: prev.name || file.name,
   178â†’        dataUrl: reader.result as string,
   179â†’      }));
   180â†’    };
   181â†’    reader.readAsDataURL(file);
   182â†’    e.target.value = '';
   183â†’  };
   184â†’
   185â†’  const formatDate = (dateStr: string) => {
   186â†’    const date = new Date(dateStr);
   187â†’    return date.toLocaleDateString('zh-TW', { month: 'long', day: 'numeric' });
   188â†’  };
   189â†’
   190â†’  return (
   191â†’    <div className="retro-panel h-full flex flex-col overflow-hidden p-4">
   192â†’      {!selectedDate ? (
   193â†’        <>
   194â†’          {/* Compact Header with Person Tabs + Month Navigation */}
   195â†’          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-3 shrink-0">
   196â†’            {/* Person Tabs - Compact */}
   197â†’            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   198â†’              {(['ja', 'jo'] as PersonType[]).map((person) => {
   199â†’                const config = PERSON_CONFIG[person];
   200â†’                const isActive = activePerson === person;
   201â†’                return (
   202â†’                  <button
   203â†’                    key={person}
   204â†’                    onClick={() => handlePersonChange(person)}
   205â†’                    className={`retro-btn relative px-4 py-1.5 font-bold text-xs uppercase transition-all ${
   206â†’                      isActive
   207â†’                        ? `${config.color} text-white border-2 border-black`
   208â†’                        : 'bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100'
   209â†’                    }`}
   210â†’                  >
   211â†’                    {config.name}
   212â†’                  </button>
   213â†’                );
   214â†’              })}
   215â†’            </div>
   216â†’
   217â†’            {/* Month Display + Navigation */}
   218â†’            <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
   219â†’              <button
   220â†’                onClick={handlePrevMonth}
   221â†’                className="retro-btn p-1.5 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-300"
   222â†’              >
   223â†’                <ChevronLeft className="w-4 h-4" />
   224â†’              </button>
   225â†’              <h2 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase min-w-[140px] text-center">{monthInfo.monthName}</h2>
   226â†’              <button
   227â†’                onClick={handleNextMonth}
   228â†’                className="retro-btn p-1.5 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-300"
   229â†’              >
   230â†’                <ChevronRight className="w-4 h-4" />
   231â†’              </button>
   232â†’            </div>
   233â†’          </div>
   234â†’
   235â†’          {/* Grid Header */}
   236â†’          <div className="grid grid-cols-7 gap-2 mb-2 shrink-0">
   237â†’            {days.map(d => (
   238â†’              <div key={d} className="text-center text-xs font-bold text-gray-700 uppercase tracking-wider border-b border-gray-300 pb-1">
   239â†’                {d}
   240â†’              </div>
   241â†’            ))}
   242â†’          </div>
   243â†’
   244â†’          {/* Grid Body - No scroll, fit to screen */}
   245â†’          <div className="grid grid-cols-7 gap-2 flex-1 min-h-0 p-1">
   246â†’        {/* Empty slots for first week */}
   247â†’        {Array.from({ length: monthInfo.firstDay }).map((_, i) => (
   248â†’          <div key={`empty-${i}`} className="p-2" />
   249â†’        ))}
   250â†’
   251â†’        {/* Days */}
   252â†’        {Array.from({ length: monthInfo.daysInMonth }).map((_, i) => {
   253â†’          const dayNum = i + 1;
   254â†’          const dateStr = getDateStr(dayNum);
   255â†’          const entry = dailyEntries[dateStr];
   256â†’          const isToday = dateStr === todayStr;
   257â†’          const isSelected = dateStr === selectedDate;
   258â†’          const hasContent = entry?.content || (entry?.materials && entry.materials.length > 0);
   259â†’
   260â†’          return (
   261â†’            <motion.div
   262â†’              key={dayNum}
   263â†’              whileHover={{ y: -1 }}
   264â†’              onClick={() => handleDayClick(dayNum)}
   265â†’              className={`
   266â†’                retro-panel p-2 transition-all duration-200 flex flex-col gap-0.5 overflow-hidden h-full cursor-pointer relative
   267â†’                ${isToday
   268â†’                  ? 'border-blue-500 bg-blue-100'
   269â†’                  : isSelected
   270â†’                    ? 'border-emerald-500 bg-emerald-100'
   271â†’                    : hasContent
   272â†’                      ? 'border-gray-500 bg-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-200'
   273â†’                      : 'border-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-50'}
   274â†’              `}
   275â†’            >
   276â†’              <div className="flex justify-between items-start shrink-0">
   277â†’                <span className={`text-xs font-bold uppercase ${isToday ? 'text-blue-800' : 'text-gray-800'}`}>
   278â†’                  {dayNum}
   279â†’                </span>
   280â†’                {entry?.materials && entry.materials.length > 0 && (
   281â†’                  <span className="flex items-center gap-0.5 text-[9px] font-bold px-1 py-0.5 border border-black bg-gray-200 text-gray-800 uppercase">
   282â†’                    <Paperclip className="w-2 h-2" />
   283â†’                    {entry.materials.length}
   284â†’                  </span>
   285â†’                )}
   286â†’              </div>
   287â†’
   288â†’              {/* Content Preview - Full Display */}
   289â†’              {entry?.content && (
   290â†’                <div className="flex-1 mt-0.5 overflow-y-auto custom-scrollbar">
   291â†’                  <p className="text-xs text-gray-700 leading-snug whitespace-pre-wrap">
   292â†’                    {entry.content}
   293â†’                  </p>
   294â†’                </div>
   295â†’              )}
   296â†’
   297â†’              {/* Has content indicator */}
   298â†’              {hasContent && (
   299â†’                <div className="absolute bottom-1 right-1 w-1.5 h-1.5 border border-black bg-blue-500" />
   300â†’              )}
   301â†’            </motion.div>
   302â†’          );
   303â†’        })}
   304â†’          </div>
   305â†’        </>
   306â†’      ) : (
   307â†’        /* Edit Mode - Full Screen */
   308â†’        <motion.div
   309â†’          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
   310â†’          animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
   311â†’          exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
   312â†’          className="h-full flex flex-col"
   313â†’        >
   314â†’            <div className="flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b-2 border-gray-900 bg-gray-100 shrink-0">
   315â†’              <h3 className="font-bold text-lg text-gray-900 uppercase">
   316â†’                ENTRY_LOG // {formatDate(selectedDate)}
   317â†’              </h3>
   318â†’              <div className="flex gap-2">
   319â†’                <button
   320â†’                  onClick={handleSaveEntry}
   321â†’                  className="retro-btn bg-blue-500 text-white px-3 py-1.5 text-sm hover:bg-blue-600"
   322â†’                >
   323â†’                  <Save className="w-4 h-4" />
   324â†’                  SAVE_ENTRY
   325â†’                </button>
   326â†’                <button
   327â†’                  onClick={() => setSelectedDate(null)}
   328â†’                  className="retro-btn p-1.5 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-300"
   329â†’                >
   330â†’                  <X className="w-5 h-5" />
   331â†’                </button>
   332â†’              </div>
   333â†’            </div>
   334â†’
   335â†’            <div className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto custom-scrollbar p-5 space-y-4">
   336â†’              {/* Content Textarea */}
   337â†’              <div>
   338â†’                <label className="text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 uppercase tracking-wider mb-2 block">
   339â†’                  <FileText className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />
   340â†’                  ENTRY_CONTENT
   341â†’                </label>
   342â†’                <textarea
   343â†’                  value={editContent}
   344â†’                  onChange={(e) => setEditContent(e.target.value)}
   345â†’                  rows={5}
   346â†’                  placeholder="RECORD_DAILY_OPERATIONS_AND_OBSERVATIONS_HERE..."
   347â†’                  className="w-full px-4 py-3 border-2 border-gray-400 bg-white text-sm focus:outline-none focus:border-blue-500 resize-none"
   348â†’                />
   349â†’              </div>
   350â†’
   351â†’              {/* Attachments Section */}
   352â†’              <div>
   353â†’                <label className="text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 uppercase tracking-wider mb-2 block">
   354â†’                  <Paperclip className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />
   355â†’                  ATTACHMENTS
   356â†’                </label>
   357â†’
   358â†’                {/* Existing Materials */}
   359â†’                {editMaterials.length > 0 && (
   360â†’                  <div className="space-y-2 mb-3">
   361â†’                    {editMaterials.map(material => (
   362â†’                      <div key={material.id} className="flex items-center gap-3 p-2.5 retro-panel-inner group hover:border-blue-600">
   363â†’                        <div className={`w-8 h-8 border border-gray-900 flex items-center justify-center text-xs shrink-0
   364â†’                          ${material.type === 'link' ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' :
   365â†’                            material.type === 'image' ? 'bg-emerald-500 text-white' :
   366â†’                            material.type === 'video' ? 'bg-red-500 text-white' :
   367â†’                            material.type === 'note' ? 'bg-fuchsia-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-500 text-white'}`}
   368â†’                        >
   369â†’                          {material.type === 'link' ? <LinkIcon className="w-4 h-4" /> :
   370â†’                           material.type === 'image' ? <ImageIcon className="w-4 h-4" /> :
   371â†’                           material.type === 'video' ? <PlayCircle className="w-4 h-4" /> :
   372â†’                           <FileText className="w-4 h-4" />}
   373â†’                        </div>
   374â†’                        <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
   375â†’                          <div className="text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 truncate">{material.name}</div>
   376â†’                          {material.url && <div className="text-xs text-gray-600 truncate">{material.url}</div>}
   377â†’                          {material.note && <div className="text-xs text-gray-700 mt-0.5">{material.note}</div>}
   378â†’                        </div>
   379â†’                        {material.type === 'image' && (material.dataUrl || material.url) && (
   380â†’                          <button
   381â†’                            onClick={() => setViewingImage({ src: material.dataUrl || material.url || '', name: material.name })}
   382â†’                            className="relative group/img"
   383â†’                          >
   384â†’                            <img src={material.dataUrl || material.url} alt={material.name} className="w-12 h-12 border border-gray-900 object-cover" />
   385â†’                            <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-black/40 opacity-0 group-hover/img:opacity-100 transition-opacity flex items-center justify-center">
   386â†’                              <ZoomIn className="w-4 h-4 text-white" />
   387â†’                            </div>
   388â†’                          </button>
   389â†’                        )}
   390â†’                        <button
   391â†’                          onClick={() => handleDeleteMaterial(material.id)}
   392â†’                          className="retro-btn p-1.5 text-gray-700 hover:text-red-600 hover:bg-red-100 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-all"
   393â†’                        >
   394â†’                          <Trash2 className="w-4 h-4" />
   395â†’                        </button>
   396â†’                      </div>
   397â†’                    ))}
   398â†’                  </div>
   399â†’                )}
   400â†’
   401â†’                                  {/* Add New Material */}
   402â†’                                  <div className="space-y-3 p-3 bg-gray-100 border-2 border-dashed border-gray-400">                    {/* Type Selection */}
   403â†’                    <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
   404â†’                      {[{
   405â†’                        type: 'link',
   406â†’                        label: 'LINK',
   407â†’                        icon: LinkIcon,
   408â†’                        color: 'bg-blue-500'
   409â†’                      }, {
   410â†’                        type: 'image',
   411â†’                        label: 'IMAGE',
   412â†’                        icon: ImageIcon,
   413â†’                        color: 'bg-emerald-500'
   414â†’                      }, {
   415â†’                        type: 'file',
   416â†’                        label: 'FILE',
   417â†’                        icon: FileText,
   418â†’                        color: 'bg-amber-500'
   419â†’                      }, {
   420â†’                        type: 'video',
   421â†’                        label: 'VIDEO',
   422â†’                        icon: PlayCircle,
   423â†’                        color: 'bg-red-500'
   424â†’                      }, {
   425â†’                        type: 'note',
   426â†’                        label: 'NOTE',
   427â†’                        icon: FileText,
   428â†’                        color: 'bg-fuchsia-500'
   429â†’                      }, ].map(item => (
   430â†’                        <button
   431â†’                          key={item.type}
   432â†’                          onClick={() => setNewMaterial(prev => ({ ...prev,
   433â†’                            type: item.type as Material['type']
   434â†’                          }))}
   435â†’                          className={`retro-btn flex items-center gap-1 px-2.5 py-1.5 text-xs uppercase ${
   436â†’                            newMaterial.type === item.type ? `${item.color} text-white` : 'bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100'
   437â†’                          }`}
   438â†’                        >
   439â†’                          <item.icon className="w-3 h-3" />
   440â†’                          {item.label}
   441â†’                        </button>
   442â†’                      ))}
   443â†’                    </div>
   444â†’
   445â†’                    {/* Name Input */}
   446â†’                    <input
   447â†’                      type="text"
   448â†’                      placeholder="ATTACHMENT_NAME"
   449â†’                      value={newMaterial.name}
   450â†’                      onChange={(e) => setNewMaterial(prev => ({ ...prev, name: e.target.value }))}
   451â†’                      className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-2 border-gray-400 bg-white text-sm focus:outline-none focus:border-blue-500 uppercase"
   452â†’                    />
   453â†’
   454â†’                                      {/* Type-specific inputs */}
   455â†’                                      {newMaterial.type === 'note' ? (
   456â†’                                        <textarea
   457â†’                                          placeholder="NOTE_CONTENT..."
   458â†’                                          value={newMaterial.note || ''}
   459â†’                                          onChange={(e) => setNewMaterial(prev => ({ ...prev, note: e.target.value }))}
   460â†’                                          rows={2}
   461â†’                                          className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-2 border-gray-400 bg-white text-sm focus:outline-none focus:border-blue-500 resize-none"
   462â†’                                        />
   463â†’                                      ) : newMaterial.type === 'image' ? (
   464â†’                                        <div className="space-y-2">
   465â†’                                          <input
   466â†’                                            type="text"
   467â†’                                            placeholder="IMAGE_URL (OR_UPLOAD)"
   468â†’                                            value={newMaterial.url}
   469â†’                                            onChange={(e) => setNewMaterial(prev => ({ ...prev, url: e.target.value, dataUrl: '' }))}
   470â†’                                            className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-2 border-gray-400 bg-white text-sm focus:outline-none focus:border-blue-500"
   471â†’                                          />
   472â†’                                          <label className="retro-btn flex items-center justify-center gap-2 w-full py-2.5 bg-emerald-500 text-white cursor-pointer hover:bg-emerald-600">
   473â†’                                            <Upload className="w-3.5 h-3.5" />
   474â†’                                            UPLOAD_IMAGE
   475â†’                                            <input type="file" className="hidden" accept="image/*" onChange={(e) => handleFileUpload(e, 'image')} />
   476â†’                                          </label>
   477â†’                                          {newMaterial.dataUrl && (
   478â†’                                            <div className="relative">
   479â†’                                              <img src={newMaterial.dataUrl} alt="PREVIEW" className="w-full h-24 object-cover border border-gray-900" />
   480â†’                                              <button
   481â†’                                                onClick={() => setNewMaterial(prev => ({ ...prev, dataUrl: '' }))}
   482â†’                                                className="retro-btn absolute top-1 right-1 p-1 bg-red-500 text-white hover:bg-red-600"
   483â†’                                              >
   484â†’                                                <X className="w-3 h-3" />
   485â†’                                              </button>
   486â†’                                            </div>
   487â†’                                          )}
   488â†’                                        </div>
   489â†’                                      ) : newMaterial.type === 'file' ? (
   490â†’                                        <div className="space-y-2">
   491â†’                                          <input
   492â†’                                            type="text"
   493â†’                                            placeholder="FILE_URL (OR_UPLOAD)"
   494â†’                                            value={newMaterial.url}
   495â†’                                            onChange={(e) => setNewMaterial(prev => ({ ...prev, url: e.target.value, dataUrl: '' }))}
   496â†’                                            className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-2 border-gray-400 bg-white text-sm focus:outline-none focus:border-blue-500"
   497â†’                                          />
   498â†’                                          <label className="retro-btn flex items-center justify-center gap-2 w-full py-2.5 bg-amber-500 text-white cursor-pointer hover:bg-amber-600">
   499â†’                                            <Upload className="w-3.5 h-3.5" />
   500â†’                                            UPLOAD_FILE
   501â†’                                            <input type="file" className="hidden" accept="audio/*,.pdf,.doc,.docx,.xls,.xlsx,.ppt,.pptx,.txt,.mp3,.m4a,.wav" onChange={(e) => handleFileUpload(e, 'file')} />
   502â†’                                          </label>
   503â†’                                          {newMaterial.dataUrl && (
   504â†’                                            <div className="relative">
   505â†’                                              <input type="text" value={newMaterial.name} readOnly className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-2 border-gray-400 bg-gray-100 text-sm" />
   506â†’                                              <button
   507â†’                                                onClick={() => setNewMaterial(prev => ({ ...prev, dataUrl: '', name: '' }))}
   508â†’                                                className="retro-btn absolute top-1 right-1 p-1 bg-red-500 text-white hover:bg-red-600"
   509â†’                                              >
   510â†’                                                <X className="w-3 h-3" />
   511â†’                                              </button>
   512â†’                                            </div>
   513â†’                                          )}
   514â†’                                        </div>
   515â†’                                      ) : (
   516â†’                                        <input
   517â†’                                          type="text"
   518â†’                                          placeholder={newMaterial.type === 'video' ? 'VIDEO_URL' : 'LINK_URL'}

   522â†’                                        />
   523â†’                                      )}
   524â†’                                      {/* Add Button */}
   525â†’                                      <button
   526â†’                                        onClick={handleAddMaterial}
   527â†’                                        disabled={!newMaterial.name || (newMaterial.type !== 'note' && newMaterial.type !== 'file' && newMaterial.type !== 'image' && !newMaterial.url)}
   528â†’                                        className="retro-btn w-full py-2 bg-blue-500 text-white hover:bg-blue-600 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   529â†’                                      >
   530â†’                                        <Plus className="w-4 h-4" />
   531â†’                                        ADD_ATTACHMENT
   532â†’                                      </button>                </div>
   533â†’              </div>
   534â†’            </div>
   535â†’        </motion.div>
   536â†’      )}
   537â†’
   538â†’      {/* Image Viewer Modal */}
   539â†’      <AnimatePresence>
   540â†’        {viewingImage && (
   541â†’          <motion.div
   542â†’            initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
   543â†’            animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
   544â†’            exit={{ opacity: 0 }}
   545â†’            onClick={() => setViewingImage(null)}
   546â†’            className="fixed inset-0 bg-black/80 z-[100] flex items-center justify-center p-8 cursor-zoom-out"
   547â†’          >
   548â†’            <motion.div
   549â†’              initial={{ scale: 0.9, opacity: 0 }}
   550â†’              animate={{ scale: 1, opacity: 1 }}
   551â†’              exit={{ scale: 0.9, opacity: 0 }}
   552â†’              onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}
   553â†’              className="retro-panel relative max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-hidden"
   554â†’            >
   555â†’              {/* Header */}
   556â†’              <div className="flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b-2 border-gray-900 bg-gray-100">
   557â†’                <h4 className="font-bold text-gray-900 truncate uppercase">{viewingImage.name}</h4>
   558â†’                <button
   559â†’                  onClick={() => setViewingImage(null)}
   560â†’                  className="retro-btn p-2 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-300"
   561â†’                >
   562â†’                  <X className="w-5 h-5" />
   563â†’                </button>
   564â†’              </div>
   565â†’
   566â†’              {/* Image */}
   567â†’              <div className="p-4 bg-gray-50">
   568â†’                <img
   569â†’                  src={viewingImage.src}
   570â†’                  alt={viewingImage.name}
   571â†’                  className="max-w-full max-h-[70vh] object-contain mx-auto border border-gray-900"
   572â†’                />
   573â†’              </div>
   574â†’            </motion.div>
   575â†’          </motion.div>
   576â†’        )}
   577â†’      </AnimatePresence>
   578â†’    </div>
   579â†’  );
   580â†’};
   581â†’
```

 `./rainbow-gantt-v2/api/notes.ts`
```
     1â†’import { Redis } from '@upstash/redis';
     2â†’import type { VercelRequest, VercelResponse } from '@vercel/node';
     3â†’
     4â†’const NOTES_KEY = 'gantt-v2:notes';
     5â†’
     6â†’const corsHeaders = {
     7â†’  'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*',
     8â†’  'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS',
     9â†’  'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'Content-Type',
    10â†’};
    11â†’
    12â†’let redis: Redis | null = null;
    13â†’function getRedis() {
    14â†’  if (!redis) {
    15â†’    redis = new Redis({
    16â†’      url: process.env.KV_REST_API_URL!,
    17â†’      token: process.env.KV_REST_API_TOKEN!,
    18â†’    });
    19â†’  }
    20â†’  return redis;
    21â†’}
    22â†’
    23â†’export default async function handler(req: VercelRequest, res: VercelResponse) {
    24â†’  if (req.method === 'OPTIONS') {
    25â†’    return res.status(200).setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*')
    26â†’      .setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS')
    27â†’      .setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', 'Content-Type')
    28â†’      .end();
    29â†’  }
    30â†’
    31â†’  Object.entries(corsHeaders).forEach(([key, value]) => {
    32â†’    res.setHeader(key, value);
    33â†’  });
    34â†’
    35â†’  try {
    36â†’    const db = getRedis();
    37â†’
    38â†’    switch (req.method) {
    39â†’      case 'GET': {
    40â†’        const notes = await db.get(NOTES_KEY) || [];
    41â†’        return res.status(200).json({ notes });
    42â†’      }
    43â†’
    44â†’      case 'POST': {
    45â†’        const newNote = req.body;
    46â†’        if (!newNote || !newNote.title) {
    47â†’          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Note title is required' });
    48â†’        }
    49â†’
    50â†’        const notes: any[] = await db.get(NOTES_KEY) || [];
    51â†’        const noteWithId = {
    52â†’          ...newNote,
    53â†’          id: newNote.id || Date.now().toString(),
    54â†’          createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    55â†’          updatedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    56â†’        };
    57â†’        notes.push(noteWithId);
    58â†’        await db.set(NOTES_KEY, notes);
    59â†’        return res.status(201).json({ note: noteWithId });
    60â†’      }
    61â†’
    62â†’      case 'PUT': {
    63â†’        const { id, ...updates } = req.body;
    64â†’
    65â†’        if (Array.isArray(req.body)) {
    66â†’          await db.set(NOTES_KEY, req.body);
    67â†’          return res.status(200).json({ notes: req.body });
    68â†’        }
    69â†’
    70â†’        if (!id) {
    71â†’          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Note ID is required' });
    72â†’        }
    73â†’
    74â†’        const notes: any[] = await db.get(NOTES_KEY) || [];
    75â†’        const index = notes.findIndex(n => String(n.id) === String(id));
    76â†’
    77â†’        if (index === -1) {
    78â†’          return res.status(404).json({ error: 'Note not found' });
    79â†’        }
    80â†’
    81â†’        notes[index] = {
    82â†’          ...notes[index],
    83â†’          ...updates,
    84â†’          id,
    85â†’          updatedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    86â†’        };
    87â†’
    88â†’        await db.set(NOTES_KEY, notes);
    89â†’        return res.status(200).json({ note: notes[index] });
    90â†’      }
    91â†’
    92â†’      case 'DELETE': {
    93â†’        const noteId = req.query.id as string;
    94â†’        if (!noteId) {
    95â†’          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Note ID is required' });
    96â†’        }
    97â†’
    98â†’        const notes: any[] = await db.get(NOTES_KEY) || [];
    99â†’        const filtered = notes.filter(n => String(n.id) !== String(noteId));
   100â†’
   101â†’        if (filtered.length === notes.length) {
   102â†’          return res.status(404).json({ error: 'Note not found' });
   103â†’        }
   104â†’
   105â†’        await db.set(NOTES_KEY, filtered);
   106â†’        return res.status(200).json({ success: true });
   107â†’      }
   108â†’
   109â†’      default:
   110â†’        return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });
   111â†’    }
   112â†’  } catch (error) {
   113â†’    console.error('Notes API error:', error);
   114â†’    return res.status(500).json({ error: 'Internal server error', details: String(error) });
   115â†’  }
   116â†’}
   117â†’
```

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="Write"><details>
<summary>Tool use: **Write**</summary>


```typescript
import { Redis } from '@upstash/redis';
import type { VercelRequest, VercelResponse } from '@vercel/node';

const CALENDAR_KEY_JA = 'gantt-v2:calendar:ja';
const CALENDAR_KEY_JO = 'gantt-v2:calendar:jo';

const corsHeaders = {
  'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*',
  'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS',
  'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'Content-Type',
};

let redis: Redis | null = null;
function getRedis() {
  if (!redis) {
    redis = new Redis({
      url: process.env.KV_REST_API_URL!,
      token: process.env.KV_REST_API_TOKEN!,
    });
  }
  return redis;
}

export default async function handler(req: VercelRequest, res: VercelResponse) {
  if (req.method === 'OPTIONS') {
    return res.status(200).setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*')
      .setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS')
      .setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', 'Content-Type')
      .end();
  }

  Object.entries(corsHeaders).forEach(([key, value]) => {
    res.setHeader(key, value);
  });

  try {
    const db = getRedis();
    const person = req.query.person as string;

    // é©—è­‰ person åƒæ•¸
    if (!person || (person !== 'ja' && person !== 'jo')) {
      return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Invalid person parameter. Must be "ja" or "jo"' });
    }

    const calendarKey = person === 'ja' ? CALENDAR_KEY_JA : CALENDAR_KEY_JO;

    switch (req.method) {
      case 'GET': {
        const entries = await db.get(calendarKey) || {};
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'PUT': {
        // å®Œæ•´æ›¿æ›æ‰€æœ‰æ—¥æ›†æ¢ç›®
        const entries = req.body;
        if (!entries || typeof entries !== 'object') {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Invalid entries data' });
        }

        await db.set(calendarKey, entries);
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'POST': {
        // æ–°å¢æˆ–æ›´æ–°å–®ä¸€æ—¥æœŸçš„æ¢ç›®
        const { date, entry } = req.body;
        if (!date || !entry) {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Date and entry are required' });
        }

        const entries: any = await db.get(calendarKey) || {};
        entries[date] = entry;
        await db.set(calendarKey, entries);
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'DELETE': {
        const date = req.query.date as string;
        if (!date) {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Date parameter is required' });
        }

        const entries: any = await db.get(calendarKey) || {};
        delete entries[date];
        await db.set(calendarKey, entries);
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      default:
        return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Calendar API error:', error);
    return res.status(500).json({ error: 'Internal server error', details: String(error) });
  }
}

```

#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Vercel è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–éƒ¨ç½²è„šæœ¬
# ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•: ./deploy-to-vercel.sh <project-name>
# ç¤ºä¾‹: ./deploy-to-vercel.sh rainbow-gantt

  echo "âŒ é”™è¯¯: è¯·æä¾›é¡¹ç›®åç§°"
  echo "ç”¨æ³•: ./deploy-to-vercel.sh <project-name>"
  echo ""
  echo "ç¤ºä¾‹:"
  echo "  ./deploy-to-vercel.sh rainbow-gantt"
  echo "  ./deploy-to-vercel.sh meeting-recorder"
  exit 1

if ! [[ "$PROJECT_NAME" =~ ^[a-z0-9]+(-[a-z0-9]+)*$ ]]; then
  echo "âŒ é”™è¯¯: é¡¹ç›®åç§°å¿…é¡»ä½¿ç”¨ kebab-case æ ¼å¼"
  echo "   ä¾‹å¦‚: rainbow-gantt, meeting-recorder"
  echo "   å½“å‰: $PROJECT_NAME"
  exit 1

  echo "âš ï¸  è­¦å‘Š: å½“å‰ç›®å½•å¯èƒ½ä¸æ˜¯é¡¹ç›®æ ¹ç›®å½•"

  echo
  if [[ ! $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then
    exit 1
  fi

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929)**_

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="Write"><details>
<summary>Tool use: **Write**</summary>


```typescript
import { createClient } from 'redis';
import type { VercelRequest, VercelResponse } from '@vercel/node';

const CALENDAR_KEY_JA = 'gantt-v2:calendar:ja';
const CALENDAR_KEY_JO = 'gantt-v2:calendar:jo';

const corsHeaders = {
  'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*',
  'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS',
  'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'Content-Type',
};

let redisClient: any = null;

async function getRedis() {
  if (!redisClient) {
    redisClient = createClient({
      url: process.env.REDIS_URL,
    });

    redisClient.on('error', (err: any) => console.error('Redis Client Error', err));

    if (!redisClient.isOpen) {
      await redisClient.connect();
    }
  }
  return redisClient;
}

export default async function handler(req: VercelRequest, res: VercelResponse) {
  if (req.method === 'OPTIONS') {
    return res.status(200).setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*')
      .setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS')
      .setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', 'Content-Type')
      .end();
  }

  Object.entries(corsHeaders).forEach(([key, value]) => {
    res.setHeader(key, value);
  });

  try {
    const db = await getRedis();
    const person = req.query.person as string;

    // é©—è­‰ person åƒæ•¸
    if (!person || (person !== 'ja' && person !== 'jo')) {
      return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Invalid person parameter. Must be "ja" or "jo"' });
    }

    const calendarKey = person === 'ja' ? CALENDAR_KEY_JA : CALENDAR_KEY_JO;

    switch (req.method) {
      case 'GET': {
        const data = await db.get(calendarKey);
        const entries = data ? JSON.parse(data) : {};
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'PUT': {
        // å®Œæ•´æ›¿æ›æ‰€æœ‰æ—¥æ›†æ¢ç›®
        const entries = req.body;
        if (!entries || typeof entries !== 'object') {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Invalid entries data' });
        }

        await db.set(calendarKey, JSON.stringify(entries));
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'POST': {
        // æ–°å¢æˆ–æ›´æ–°å–®ä¸€æ—¥æœŸçš„æ¢ç›®
        const { date, entry } = req.body;
        if (!date || !entry) {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Date and entry are required' });
        }

        const data = await db.get(calendarKey);
        const entries: any = data ? JSON.parse(data) : {};
        entries[date] = entry;
        await db.set(calendarKey, JSON.stringify(entries));
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'DELETE': {
        const date = req.query.date as string;
        if (!date) {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Date parameter is required' });
        }

        const data = await db.get(calendarKey);
        const entries: any = data ? JSON.parse(data) : {};
        delete entries[date];
        await db.set(calendarKey, JSON.stringify(entries));
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      default:
        return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Calendar API error:', error);
    return res.status(500).json({ error: 'Internal server error', details: String(error) });
  }
}

```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929)**_

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="Write"><details>
<summary>Tool use: **Write**</summary>


```typescript
import { createClient } from 'redis';
import type { VercelRequest, VercelResponse } from '@vercel/node';

const CALENDAR_KEY_JA = 'gantt-v2:calendar:ja';
const CALENDAR_KEY_JO = 'gantt-v2:calendar:jo';

const corsHeaders = {
  'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*',
  'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS',
  'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'Content-Type',
};

let redisClient: any = null;

async function getRedis() {
  if (!redisClient) {
    redisClient = createClient({
      url: process.env.REDIS_URL,
    });

    redisClient.on('error', (err: any) => console.error('Redis Client Error', err));

    if (!redisClient.isOpen) {
      await redisClient.connect();
    }
  }
  return redisClient;
}

export default async function handler(req: VercelRequest, res: VercelResponse) {
  if (req.method === 'OPTIONS') {
    return res.status(200).setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*')
      .setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS')
      .setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', 'Content-Type')
      .end();
  }

  Object.entries(corsHeaders).forEach(([key, value]) => {
    res.setHeader(key, value);
  });

  try {
    const db = await getRedis();
    const person = req.query.person as string;

    // é©—è­‰ person åƒæ•¸
    if (!person || (person !== 'ja' && person !== 'jo')) {
      return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Invalid person parameter. Must be "ja" or "jo"' });
    }

    const calendarKey = person === 'ja' ? CALENDAR_KEY_JA : CALENDAR_KEY_JO;

    switch (req.method) {
      case 'GET': {
        const data = await db.get(calendarKey);
        const entries = data ? JSON.parse(data) : {};
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'PUT': {
        // å®Œæ•´æ›¿æ›æ‰€æœ‰æ—¥æ›†æ¢ç›®
        const entries = req.body;
        if (!entries || typeof entries !== 'object') {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Invalid entries data' });
        }

        await db.set(calendarKey, JSON.stringify(entries));
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'POST': {
        // æ–°å¢æˆ–æ›´æ–°å–®ä¸€æ—¥æœŸçš„æ¢ç›®
        const { date, entry } = req.body;
        if (!date || !entry) {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Date and entry are required' });
        }

        const data = await db.get(calendarKey);
        const entries: any = data ? JSON.parse(data) : {};
        entries[date] = entry;
        await db.set(calendarKey, JSON.stringify(entries));
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      case 'DELETE': {
        const date = req.query.date as string;
        if (!date) {
          return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Date parameter is required' });
        }

        const data = await db.get(calendarKey);
        const entries: any = data ? JSON.parse(data) : {};
        delete entries[date];
        await db.set(calendarKey, JSON.stringify(entries));
        return res.status(200).json({ entries });
      }

      default:
        return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Calendar API error:', error);
    return res.status(500).json({ error: 'Internal server error', details: String(error) });
  }
}
```


### å››ã€å…·é«”å¯¦ç¾æ–¹æ¡ˆ

**æ•¸æ“šæ¨¡å‹**ï¼š

```javascript
const task = {
  id: 'task-1',
  title: 'è¨­è¨ˆ UI',
  startDate: '2025-12-21',
```

**æ¸²æŸ“é‚è¼¯**ï¼š
```javascript
function renderDependencies() {
  const svg = document.getElementById('dependency-lines') || createSVGOverlay();
  svg.innerHTML = ''; // æ¸…ç©ºç¾æœ‰ç·šæ¢
  
  tasks.forEach(task => {
    if (task.dependencies && task.dependencies.length > 0) {
      task.dependencies.forEach(depId => {
        const depTask = tasks.find(t => t.id === depId);
        if (depTask) {
          drawArrow(svg, depTask, task);
        }
      });
    }
  });
}

function drawArrow(svg, fromTask, toTask) {
  // è¨ˆç®—èµ·é»å’Œçµ‚é»åº§æ¨™
  const fromEl = document.querySelector(`[data-task-id="${fromTask.id}"]`);
  const toEl = document.querySelector(`[data-task-id="${toTask.id}"]`);
  
  const fromRect = fromEl.getBoundingClientRect();
  const toRect = toEl.getBoundingClientRect();
  
  // å‰µå»º SVG path å…ƒç´ 
  const path = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'path');
  const d = `M ${fromRect.right} ${fromRect.top + fromRect.height/2} 
             L ${toRect.left} ${toRect.top + toRect.height/2}`;
  path.setAttribute('d', d);
  path.setAttribute('stroke', '#999');
  path.setAttribute('stroke-width', '2');
  path.setAttribute('marker-end', 'url(#arrowhead)');
  
  svg.appendChild(path);
}
```

**æ•´åˆé»**ï¼š
- åœ¨ `updateGanttChart()` çµæŸæ™‚èª¿ç”¨ `renderDependencies()`
- åœ¨ `handleTaskDrag()` çµæŸæ™‚æ›´æ–°ä¾è³´ç·šæ¢

```javascript
function loadProject(projectId) {
  const projects = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('gantt-projects')) || {};
  const project = projects[projectId];
  
  if (project) {
    tasks = project.tasks;
    currentProjectId = projectId;
    updateGanttChart();
  }
}

function createNewProject() {
  const name = prompt('è¼¸å…¥å°ˆæ¡ˆåç¨±ï¼š');
  if (!name) return;
  
  const projectId = 'project-' + Date.now();
  const projects = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('gantt-projects')) || {};
  
  projects[projectId] = {
    name: name,
    tasks: [],
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  localStorage.setItem('gantt-projects', JSON.stringify(projects));
  
  // æ›´æ–°é¸æ“‡å™¨
  updateProjectSelector();
  loadProject(projectId);
}
```

#### 3. å ±è¡¨åŠŸèƒ½

**UI è§¸ç™¼**ï¼š
```html
<button onclick="showReport()">æŸ¥çœ‹çµ±è¨ˆå ±è¡¨</button>
```

**è¨ˆç®—é‚è¼¯**ï¼š
```javascript
function generateReport() {
  const now = new Date();
  
  const stats = {
    totalTasks: tasks.length,
    completedTasks: tasks.filter(t => t.status === 'completed').length,
    overdueTasks: tasks.filter(t => {
      return t.status !== 'completed' && new Date(t.endDate) < now;
    }).length,
    upcomingTasks: tasks.filter(t => {
      const start = new Date(t.startDate);
      const daysDiff = (start - now) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24);
      return daysDiff > 0 && daysDiff <= 7;
    }).length,
    completionRate: 0
  };
  
  stats.completionRate = stats.totalTasks > 0 
    ? (stats.completedTasks / stats.totalTasks * 100).toFixed(1)
    : 0;
  
  return stats;
}

function showReport() {
  const stats = generateReport();
  
  const reportHTML = `
    <div class="report-modal">
      <h2>å°ˆæ¡ˆçµ±è¨ˆå ±è¡¨</h2>
      <div class="stats-grid">
        <div class="stat-item">
          <h3>${stats.totalTasks}</h3>
          <p>ç¸½ä»»å‹™æ•¸</p>
        </div>
        <div class="stat-item">
          <h3>${stats.completionRate}%</h3>
          <p>å®Œæˆç‡</p>
        </div>
        <div class="stat-item">
          <h3>${stats.overdueTasks}</h3>
          <p>é€¾æœŸä»»å‹™</p>
        </div>
        <div class="stat-item">
          <h3>${stats.upcomingTasks}</h3>
          <p>æœ¬é€±å¾…è¾¦</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      <button onclick="closeReport()">é—œé–‰</button>
    </div>
  `;
  
  document.body.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', reportHTML);
}
```

#### 4. å¿«é€Ÿéµæ”¯æŒ

**å¯¦ç¾æ–¹å¼**ï¼š
```javascript
document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
  // å¿½ç•¥åœ¨è¼¸å…¥æ¡†ä¸­çš„æŒ‰éµ
  if (e.target.tagName === 'INPUT' || e.target.tagName === 'TEXTAREA') {
    return;
  }
  
  switch(e.key.toLowerCase()) {
    case 'n':
      e.preventDefault();
      openAddTaskDialog();
      break;
    case 'd':
      if (selectedTask) {
        e.preventDefault();
        deleteTask(selectedTask.id);
      }
      break;
    case 'e':
      if (selectedTask) {
        e.preventDefault();
        editTask(selectedTask.id);
      }
      break;
    case 'r':
      e.preventDefault();
      showReport();
      break;
    case 's':
      if (e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) {
        e.preventDefault();
        saveTasks();
        showNotification('å·²ä¿å­˜');
      }
      break;
    case '?':
      e.preventDefault();
      showKeyboardHelp();
      break;
  }
});

function showKeyboardHelp() {
  const helpHTML = `
    <div class="keyboard-help-modal">
      <h3>å¿«é€Ÿéµèªªæ˜</h3>
      <ul>
        <li><kbd>N</kbd> - æ–°å¢ä»»å‹™</li>
        <li><kbd>E</kbd> - ç·¨è¼¯é¸ä¸­ä»»å‹™</li>
        <li><kbd>D</kbd> - åˆªé™¤é¸ä¸­ä»»å‹™</li>
        <li><kbd>R</kbd> - æŸ¥çœ‹å ±è¡¨</li>
        <li><kbd>Ctrl+S</kbd> - æ‰‹å‹•ä¿å­˜</li>
        <li><kbd>?</kbd> - é¡¯ç¤ºæ­¤å¹«åŠ©</li>
      </ul>
      <button onclick="closeKeyboardHelp()">é—œé–‰</button>
    </div>
  `;
  
  document.body.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', helpHTML);
}
```

#### 5. è‡ªå‹•ä¿å­˜æ©Ÿåˆ¶

**Debounce å¯¦ç¾**ï¼š
```javascript
function debounce(func, wait) {
  let timeout;
  return function executedFunction(...args) {
    const later = () => {
      clearTimeout(timeout);
      func(...args);
    };
    clearTimeout(timeout);
    timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
  };
}

// åŒ…è£ä¿å­˜å‡½æ•¸
const autoSave = debounce(() => {
  saveTasks();
  showNotification('å·²è‡ªå‹•ä¿å­˜', 'success');
}, 500);

// åœ¨ä»»ä½•ä¿®æ”¹æ“ä½œå¾Œèª¿ç”¨
function updateTaskProperty(taskId, property, value) {
  const task = tasks.find(t => t.id === taskId);
  if (task) {
    task[property] = value;
    updateGanttChart();
    autoSave(); // è§¸ç™¼è‡ªå‹•ä¿å­˜
  }
}
```

**è¦–è¦ºåé¥‹**ï¼š
```javascript
function showNotification(message, type = 'info') {
  const notification = document.createElement('div');
  notification.className = `notification notification-${type}`;
  notification.textContent = message;
  
  document.body.appendChild(notification);
  
  setTimeout(() => {
    notification.classList.add('fade-out');
    setTimeout(() => notification.remove(), 300);
  }, 2000);
}
```

    75â†’        className="w-full flex items-center justify-between gap-1.5 px-2.5 py-1.5 rounded-full border border-slate-200 bg-white hover:border-pink-300 transition-all text-xs text-left h-8"

    77â†’        <span className={`truncate max-w-[80px] ${value ? 'text-slate-700 font-medium' : 'text-slate-400'}`}>{value || placeholder}</span>
    78â†’        <ChevronDown className={`w-3.5 h-3.5 text-slate-400 transition-transform shrink-0 ${isOpen ? 'rotate-180' : ''}`} />
    79â†’      </button>
    80â†’
    81â†’      <AnimatePresence>
    82â†’        {isOpen && (
    83â†’          <motion.div
    84â†’            initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}
    85â†’            animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
    86â†’            exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}
    87â†’            className="absolute top-full left-0 right-0 mt-1 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-xl border border-slate-100 overflow-hidden z-50"
    88â†’          >
    89â†’            <div className="max-h-48 overflow-y-auto">
    90â†’              {options.map(opt => (
    91â†’                <button
    92â†’                  key={opt}
    93â†’                  onClick={() => { onChange(opt); setIsOpen(false); }}
    94â†’                  className={`w-full text-left px-3 py-2 text-sm hover:bg-pink-50 transition-colors ${
    95â†’                    value === opt ? 'bg-pink-100 text-pink-700 font-bold' : 'text-slate-600'
    96â†’                  }`}
    97â†’                >
    98â†’                  {opt}
    99â†’                </button>
   100â†’              ))}
   101â†’            </div>
   102â†’            {onAddOption && (
   103â†’              <div className="border-t border-slate-100 p-2">
   104â†’                <div className="flex gap-1">
   105â†’                  <input
   106â†’                    type="text"
   107â†’                    value={inputValue}
   108â†’                    onChange={(e) => setInputValue(e.target.value)}
   109â†’                    onKeyDown={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleAdd()}
   110â†’                    placeholder="æ–°å¢..."
   111â†’                    className="flex-1 px-2 py-1.5 text-xs border border-slate-200 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-pink-300 outline-none"
   112â†’                  />
   113â†’                  <button
   114â†’                    onClick={handleAdd}
   115â†’                    disabled={!inputValue.trim()}
   116â†’                    className="px-2 py-1.5 bg-pink-500 text-white rounded-lg text-xs font-bold disabled:opacity-50"
   117â†’                  >
   118â†’                    <Plus className="w-3 h-3" />
   119â†’                  </button>
   120â†’                </div>
   121â†’              </div>
   122â†’            )}
   123â†’          </motion.div>
   124â†’        )}
   125â†’      </AnimatePresence>
   126â†’    </div>
   127â†’  );
   128â†’};
   129â†’
   130â†’// å¤šé¸äººå“¡çµ„ä»¶
   131â†’interface MultiSelectPeopleProps {
   132â†’  value: string[];
   133â†’  options: string[];
   134â†’  onChange: (value: string[]) => void;
   135â†’  onAddOption?: (option: string) => void;
   136â†’}
   137â†’
   138â†’const MultiSelectPeople: React.FC<MultiSelectPeopleProps> = ({ value, options, onChange, onAddOption }) => {
   139â†’  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
   140â†’  const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState('');
   141â†’  const ref = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
   142â†’
   143â†’  useEffect(() => {
   144â†’    const handleClickOutside = (e: MouseEvent) => {
   145â†’      if (ref.current && !ref.current.contains(e.target as Node)) {
   146â†’        setIsOpen(false);
   147â†’      }
   148â†’    };
   149â†’    document.addEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside);
   150â†’    return () => document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside);
   151â†’  }, []);
   152â†’
   153â†’  const handleToggle = (person: string) => {
   154â†’    if (value.includes(person)) {
   155â†’      onChange(value.filter(p => p !== person));
   156â†’    } else {
   157â†’      onChange([...value, person]);
   158â†’    }
   159â†’  };
   160â†’
   161â†’  const handleAdd = () => {
   162â†’    const trimmed = inputValue.trim();
   163â†’    if (trimmed) {
   164â†’      if (!options.includes(trimmed)) {
   165â†’        onAddOption?.(trimmed);
   166â†’      }
   167â†’      if (!value.includes(trimmed)) {
   168â†’        onChange([...value, trimmed]);
   169â†’      }
   170â†’      setInputValue('');
   171â†’    }
   172â†’  };
   173â†’
   174â†’  return (
   175â†’    <div ref={ref} className="relative">
   176â†’      <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-2">
   177â†’        {value.map(person => (
   178â†’          <span key={person} className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-2.5 py-1 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-cyan-100 to-teal-100 text-cyan-700 text-xs font-bold">
   179â†’            <span className="w-5 h-5 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-br from-cyan-400 to-teal-500 text-white text-[10px] font-bold flex items-center justify-center">
   180â†’              {person.substring(0, 1)}
   181â†’            </span>
   182â†’            {person}
   183â†’            <button onClick={() => onChange(value.filter(p => p !== person))} className="p-0.5 hover:bg-cyan-200 rounded-full">
   184â†’              <X className="w-3 h-3" />
   185â†’            </button>
   186â†’          </span>
   187â†’        ))}
   188â†’      </div>
   189â†’
   190â†’      <button
   191â†’        onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
   192â†’        className="flex items-center gap-1.5 text-xs font-bold px-3 py-1.5 rounded-full bg-slate-100 text-slate-500 hover:bg-cyan-50 hover:text-cyan-600 transition-all"
   193â†’      >
   194â†’        <Plus className="w-3.5 h-3.5" />
   195â†’        {value.length === 0 ? 'æ–°å¢ç›¸é—œäºº' : 'æ–°å¢'}
   196â†’        <ChevronDown className={`w-3 h-3 transition-transform ${isOpen ? 'rotate-180' : ''}`} />
   197â†’      </button>
   198â†’
   199â†’      <AnimatePresence>
   200â†’        {isOpen && (
   201â†’          <motion.div
   202â†’            initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}
   203â†’            animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
   204â†’            exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}
   205â†’            className="absolute top-full left-0 mt-2 w-56 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-xl border border-slate-100 overflow-hidden z-50"
   206â†’          >
   207â†’            <div className="p-2 border-b border-slate-100">
   208â†’              <div className="flex gap-1">
   209â†’                <input
   210â†’                  type="text"
   211â†’                  value={inputValue}
   212â†’                  onChange={(e) => setInputValue(e.target.value)}
   213â†’                  onKeyDown={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleAdd()}
   214â†’                  placeholder="æœå°‹æˆ–æ–°å¢..."
   215â†’                  className="flex-1 px-2 py-1.5 text-xs border border-slate-200 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-300 outline-none"
   216â†’                />
   217â†’                <button onClick={handleAdd} disabled={!inputValue.trim()} className="px-2 py-1.5 bg-cyan-500 text-white rounded-lg text-xs font-bold disabled:opacity-50">
   218â†’                  <Plus className="w-3 h-3" />
   219â†’                </button>
   220â†’              </div>
   221â†’            </div>
   222â†’            <div className="max-h-48 overflow-y-auto">
   223â†’              {options.map(person => {
   224â†’                const isSelected = value.includes(person);
   225â†’                return (
   226â†’                  <button
   227â†’                    key={person}
   228â†’                    onClick={() => handleToggle(person)}
   229â†’                    className={`w-full flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2.5 text-sm hover:bg-slate-50 ${isSelected ? 'bg-cyan-50' : ''}`}
   230â†’                  >
   231â†’                    <div className={`w-5 h-5 rounded-md border-2 flex items-center justify-center ${isSelected ? 'bg-cyan-500 border-cyan-500' : 'border-slate-300'}`}>
   232â†’                      {isSelected && <Check className="w-3 h-3 text-white" />}
   233â†’                    </div>
   234â†’                    <span className="text-slate-700 font-medium">{person}</span>
   235â†’                  </button>
   236â†’                );
   237â†’              })}
   238â†’            </div>
   239â†’          </motion.div>
   240â†’        )}
   241â†’      </AnimatePresence>
   242â†’    </div>
   243â†’  );
   244â†’};
   245â†’
   246â†’export const ContextPanel: React.FC<ContextPanelProps> = ({ isOpen, onClose, task, onSave, onDelete, customCategories = [], onCategoriesChange }) => {
   247â†’  const [editedTask, setEditedTask] = useState<Partial<Task>>({});
   248â†’  const [categories, setCategories] = useState<string[]>([...DEFAULT_CATEGORIES, ...customCategories]);
   249â†’  const [statuses] = useState(DEFAULT_STATUS_OPTIONS.map(s => s.label));
   250â†’  const [owners, setOwners] = useState<string[]>([]);
   251â†’  const [peopleOptions, setPeopleOptions] = useState<string[]>([]);
   252â†’
   253â†’  // é™„ä»¶è¡¨å–®ç‹€æ…‹
   254â†’  const [materialType, setMaterialType] = useState<Material['type']>('link');
   255â†’  const [materialName, setMaterialName] = useState('');
   256â†’  const [materialUrl, setMaterialUrl] = useState('');
   257â†’  const [materialNote, setMaterialNote] = useState('');
   258â†’  const [materialDataUrl, setMaterialDataUrl] = useState('');
   259â†’
   260â†’  // åœ–ç‰‡æ”¾å¤§å½ˆçª—
   261â†’  const [lightboxImage, setLightboxImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
   262â†’
   263â†’  // å‚™è¨»ç‹€æ…‹
   264â†’  const [commentAuthor, setCommentAuthor] = useState('');
   265â†’  const [commentContent, setCommentContent] = useState('');
   266â†’
   267â†’  useEffect(() => {
   268â†’    if (task) {
   269â†’      setEditedTask({ ...task });
   270â†’      if (task.category && !categories.includes(task.category)) {
   271â†’        setCategories(prev => [...prev, task.category as string]);
   272â†’      }
   273â†’      if (task.owner && !owners.includes(task.owner)) {
   274â†’        setOwners(prev => [...prev, task.owner as string]);
   275â†’      }
   276â†’      if (task.stakeholders && task.stakeholders.length > 0) {
   277â†’        const names = task.stakeholders.map(s => s.name);
   278â†’        setPeopleOptions(prev => [...new Set([...prev, ...names])]);
   279â†’      }
   280â†’    } else {
   281â†’      setEditedTask({
   282â†’        name: '',
   283â†’        owner: '',
   284â†’        startDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
   285â†’        endDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
   286â†’        status: 'pending',
   287â†’        category: 'AIè³¦èƒ½',
   288â†’        progress: 0,
   289â†’        description: '',
   290â†’        materials: []
   291â†’      });
   292â†’    }
   293â†’    // é‡ç½®é™„ä»¶è¡¨å–®
   294â†’    resetMaterialForm();
   295â†’  }, [task]);
   296â†’
   297â†’  const resetMaterialForm = () => {
   298â†’    setMaterialType('link');
   299â†’    setMaterialName('');
   300â†’    setMaterialUrl('');
   301â†’    setMaterialNote('');
   302â†’    setMaterialDataUrl('');
   303â†’  };
   304â†’
   305â†’  const resetCommentForm = () => {
   306â†’    setCommentAuthor('');
   307â†’    setCommentContent('');
   308â†’  };
   309â†’
   310â†’  const handleAddComment = () => {
   311â†’    if (!commentAuthor.trim() || !commentContent.trim()) return;
   312â†’
   313â†’    const newComment: TaskComment = {
   314â†’      id: Date.now().toString(),
   315â†’      author: commentAuthor.trim(),
   316â†’      content: commentContent.trim(),
   317â†’      createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
   318â†’    };
   319â†’
   320â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({
   321â†’      ...prev,
   322â†’      comments: [...(prev.comments || []), newComment]
   323â†’    }));
   324â†’
   325â†’    resetCommentForm();
   326â†’  };
   327â†’
   328â†’  const handleDeleteComment = (commentId: string) => {
   329â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({
   330â†’      ...prev,
   331â†’      comments: (prev.comments || []).filter(c => c.id !== commentId)
   332â†’    }));
   333â†’  };
   334â†’
   335â†’  const handleSave = () => {
   336â†’    if (!editedTask.name) {
   337â†’      alert('è«‹è¼¸å…¥ä»»å‹™åç¨±');
   338â†’      return;
   339â†’    }
   340â†’    onSave?.(editedTask as Task);
   341â†’  };
   342â†’
   343â†’  const handleAddCategory = (newCat: string) => {
   344â†’    if (!categories.includes(newCat)) {
   345â†’      const updated = [...categories, newCat];
   346â†’      setCategories(updated);
   347â†’      onCategoriesChange?.(updated.filter(c => !DEFAULT_CATEGORIES.includes(c)));
   348â†’    }
   349â†’  };
   350â†’
   351â†’  const handleAddOwner = (newOwner: string) => {
   352â†’    if (!owners.includes(newOwner)) {
   353â†’      setOwners(prev => [...prev, newOwner]);
   354â†’    }
   355â†’  };
   356â†’
   357â†’  const handleAddPerson = (newPerson: string) => {
   358â†’    if (!peopleOptions.includes(newPerson)) {
   359â†’      setPeopleOptions(prev => [...prev, newPerson]);
   360â†’    }
   361â†’  };
   362â†’
   363â†’  const getStakeholderNames = (): string[] => {
   364â†’    return (editedTask.stakeholders || []).map(s => s.name);
   365â†’  };
   366â†’
   367â†’  const updateStakeholders = (names: string[]) => {
   368â†’    const stakeholders = names.map(name => ({ id: name, name, role: '' }));
   369â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, stakeholders }));
   370â†’  };
   371â†’
   372â†’  const getStatusInfo = (statusValue: string) => {
   373â†’    const found = DEFAULT_STATUS_OPTIONS.find(s => s.value === statusValue || s.label === statusValue);
   374â†’    return found || { value: statusValue as TaskStatus, label: statusValue, color: 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-600' };
   375â†’  };
   376â†’
   377â†’  const getPriorityInfo = (priority?: TaskPriority) => {
   378â†’    return PRIORITY_OPTIONS.find(p => p.value === priority);
   379â†’  };
   380â†’
   381â†’  // é™„ä»¶ç®¡ç†
   382â†’  const handleAddMaterial = () => {
   383â†’    if (!materialName) return;
   384â†’
   385â†’    const material: Material = {
   386â†’      id: Date.now().toString(),
   387â†’      type: materialType,
   388â†’      name: materialName,
   389â†’      url: materialUrl || undefined,
   390â†’      dataUrl: materialDataUrl || undefined,
   391â†’      note: materialNote || undefined,
   392â†’    };
   393â†’
   394â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({
   395â†’      ...prev,
   396â†’      materials: [...(prev.materials || []), material]
   397â†’    }));
   398â†’
   399â†’    resetMaterialForm();
   400â†’  };
   401â†’
   402â†’  const handleDeleteMaterial = (materialId: string | number) => {
   403â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({
   404â†’      ...prev,
   405â†’      materials: (prev.materials || []).filter(m => m.id !== materialId)
   406â†’    }));
   407â†’  };
   408â†’
   409â†’  const handleImageUpload = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
   410â†’    const file = e.target.files?.[0];
   411â†’    if (!file) return;
   412â†’    if (file.size > 5 * 1024 * 1024) {
   413â†’      alert('æª”æ¡ˆå¤§å°ä¸èƒ½è¶…é 5MB');
   414â†’      return;
   415â†’    }
   416â†’    const reader = new FileReader();
   417â†’    reader.onload = () => {
   418â†’      setMaterialDataUrl(reader.result as string);
   419â†’      if (!materialName) setMaterialName(file.name);
   420â†’    };
   421â†’    reader.readAsDataURL(file);
   422â†’    e.target.value = '';
   423â†’  };
   424â†’
   425â†’  const canAddMaterial = () => {
   426â†’    if (!materialName) return false;
   427â†’    if (materialType === 'note') return true;
   428â†’    if (materialType === 'image') return !!(materialUrl || materialDataUrl);
   429â†’    if (materialType === 'file') return !!materialDataUrl;
   430â†’    return !!materialUrl;
   431â†’  };
   432â†’
   433â†’  const currentStatus = getStatusInfo(editedTask.status || 'pending');
   434â†’  const currentPriority = getPriorityInfo(editedTask.priority);
   435â†’
   436â†’  return (
   437â†’    <>
   438â†’      {isOpen && (
   439â†’        <motion.div
   440â†’          initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
   441â†’          animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
   442â†’          exit={{ opacity: 0 }}
   443â†’          onClick={onClose}
   444â†’          className="fixed inset-0 bg-slate-900/20 backdrop-blur-sm z-[60]"
   445â†’        />
   446â†’      )}
   447â†’
   448â†’      <motion.div
   449â†’        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
   450â†’        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
   451â†’        transition={{ type: 'spring', damping: 25, stiffness: 200 }}
   452â†’        className="fixed top-0 right-0 bottom-0 w-full md:w-[480px] bg-white/95 backdrop-blur-2xl border-l border-white/50 shadow-2xl z-[70] flex flex-col"
   453â†’      >
   454â†’        {/* Header */}
   455â†’        <div className="p-4 border-b border-slate-100 bg-white/80">
   456â†’          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-3">
   457â†’            <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5">
   458â†’              {/* å„ªå…ˆç´š */}
   459â†’              <Select
   460â†’                value={currentPriority?.label || 'å„ªå…ˆç´š'}
   461â†’                options={PRIORITY_OPTIONS.map(p => p.label)}
   462â†’                onChange={(val) => {
   463â†’                  const found = PRIORITY_OPTIONS.find(p => p.label === val);
   464â†’                  if (found) setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, priority: found.value }));
   465â†’                }}
   466â†’              />
   467â†’              {/* é¡åˆ¥ */}
   468â†’              <Select
   469â†’                value={editedTask.category || ''}
   470â†’                options={categories}
   471â†’                onChange={(val) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, category: val }))}
   472â†’                onAddOption={handleAddCategory}
   473â†’                placeholder="é¡åˆ¥"
   474â†’              />
   475â†’              {/* ç‹€æ…‹ */}
   476â†’              <Select
   477â†’                value={currentStatus.label}
   478â†’                options={statuses}
   479â†’                onChange={(val) => {
   480â†’                  const found = DEFAULT_STATUS_OPTIONS.find(s => s.label === val);
   481â†’                  setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, status: found ? found.value : val as TaskStatus }));
   482â†’                }}
   483â†’                placeholder="ç‹€æ…‹"
   484â†’              />
   485â†’            </div>
   486â†’            <div className="flex items-center gap-1">
   487â†’              {task?.id && onDelete && (
   488â†’                <button
   489â†’                  onClick={() => {
   490â†’                    if (window.confirm('ç¢ºå®šè¦åˆªé™¤æ­¤ä»»å‹™å—ï¼Ÿ')) {
   491â†’                      onDelete(task.id);
   492â†’                      onClose();
   493â†’                    }
   494â†’                  }}
   495â†’                  className="p-2 hover:bg-red-100 rounded-full text-slate-400 hover:text-red-500 shrink-0 transition-colors"
   496â†’                  title="åˆªé™¤ä»»å‹™"
   497â†’                >
   498â†’                  <Trash2 className="w-5 h-5" />
   499â†’                </button>
   500â†’              )}
   501â†’              <button onClick={onClose} className="p-2 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-full text-slate-400 hover:text-slate-600 shrink-0">
   502â†’                <X className="w-5 h-5" />
   503â†’              </button>
   504â†’            </div>
   505â†’          </div>
   506â†’
   507â†’          {/* æ¨™é¡Œ */}
   508â†’          <input
   509â†’            type="text"
   510â†’            value={editedTask.name || ''}
   511â†’            onChange={(e) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, name: e.target.value }))}
   512â†’            placeholder="ä»»å‹™åç¨±"
   513â†’            className="text-xl font-black text-slate-800 bg-transparent border-b-2 border-transparent hover:border-slate-200 focus:border-pink-400 outline-none w-full pb-1 transition-colors"
   514â†’          />
   515â†’        </div>
   516â†’
   517â†’        {/* Content */}
   518â†’        <div className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto p-5 space-y-5">
   519â†’
   520â†’          {/* è² è²¬äºº & é€²åº¦ */}
   521â†’          <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4">
   522â†’            <div>
   523â†’              <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-1.5 block">
   524â†’                <User className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />è² è²¬äºº
   525â†’              </label>
   526â†’              <Select
   527â†’                value={editedTask.owner || ''}
   528â†’                options={owners}
   529â†’                onChange={(val) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, owner: val }))}
   530â†’                onAddOption={handleAddOwner}
   531â†’                placeholder="é¸æ“‡æˆ–è¼¸å…¥"
   532â†’              />
   533â†’            </div>
   534â†’            <div>
   535â†’              <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-1.5 block">
   536â†’                <Tag className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />é€²åº¦
   537â†’              </label>
   538â†’              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   539â†’                <input
   540â†’                  type="range"
   541â†’                  min="0"
   542â†’                  max="100"
   543â†’                  value={editedTask.progress || 0}

    91â†’  const dayWidth = 48;

    96â†’

   102â†’        const taskEnd = new Date(t.endDate);
