   140â†’      {/* Owner Filter Tabs */}
   141â†’      <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 shrink-0 flex-wrap">
   142â†’        {['all', ...people].map((filter) => {
   143â†’          const isActive = ownerFilter === filter;
   144â†’          const count = filter === 'all'
   145â†’            ? tasks.filter(t => !t.isPoc).length
   146â†’            : filterTasksByOwner(tasks.filter(t => !t.isPoc), filter).length;
   147â†’
   148â†’          // å‹•æ…‹é…è‰²
   149â†’          const colors = filter === 'all'
   150â†’            ? { bg: 'bg-gray-500', hover: 'hover:bg-gray-600' }
   151â†’            : { bg: 'bg-blue-500', hover: 'hover:bg-blue-600' };
   152â†’
   153â†’          return (
   154â†’            <button
   155â†’              key={filter}
   156â†’              onClick={() => setOwnerFilter(filter)}
   157â†’              className={`retro-btn relative px-5 py-2 text-sm text-white ${colors.bg} ${colors.hover} ${isActive ? 'bg-black' : ''}`}
   158â†’            >
   159â†’              {filter.toUpperCase()}
   160â†’              <span className={`ml-2 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs ${isActive ? 'bg-white text-black' : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-700'}`}>
   161â†’                {count}
   162â†’              </span>
   163â†’            </button>
   164â†’          );
   165â†’        })}
   166â†’      </div>
   167â†’
   168â†’      {/* Dashboard - åƒè€ƒèˆŠç‰ˆå½©è™¹ç”˜ç‰¹åœ–å¸ƒå±€ */}
   169â†’      <Panel className="shrink-0">
   170â†’        {isLoading ? (
   171â†’          <div className="flex items-center justify-center py-12">
   172â†’            <Loader2 className="w-8 h-8 animate-spin text-gray-500" />
   173â†’            <span className="ml-3 text-gray-700 font-medium">LOADING_DATA...</span>
   174â†’          </div>
   175â†’        ) : (
   176â†’          <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-8">
   177â†’            {/* å·¦å´ï¼šæ‰å¹³åŒ–å¯æ„›ç”œç”œåœˆ -> æ•¸æ“šç’° */}
   178â†’            <div className="flex items-center gap-6 lg:gap-8">
   179â†’              <div className="relative w-40 h-40 lg:w-48 lg:h-48 shrink-0">
   180â†’                <svg className="w-full h-full -rotate-90" viewBox="0 0 36 36">
   181â†’                  {/* Background Circle */}
   182â†’                  <circle cx="18" cy="18" r="14" fill="none" stroke="#e5e7eb" strokeWidth="6" />
   183â†’                  
   184â†’                  {/* Pie Segments */}
   185â†’                  {pieSegments.map((segment) => (
   186â†’                    <circle
   187â†’                      key={segment.category}
   188â†’                      cx="18"
   189â†’                      cy="18"
   190â†’                      r="14"
   191â†’                      fill="none"
   192â†’                      stroke={segment.color}
   193â†’                      strokeWidth="6"
   194â†’                      strokeDasharray={`${segment.percentage} ${100 - segment.percentage}`}
   195â†’                      strokeDashoffset={100 - segment.offset}
   196â†’                      strokeLinecap="butt"
   197â†’                      className="transition-all duration-500"
   198â†’                    />
   199â†’                  ))}
   200â†’                </svg>
   201â†’                <div className="absolute inset-0 flex flex-col items-center justify-center">
   202â†’                  <span className="text-xs text-gray-500 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider">OVERALL_PROGRESS</span>
   203â†’                  <span className="text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-black text-gray-900">
   204â†’                    {stats.overallProgress}%
   205â†’                  </span>
   206â†’                </div>
   207â†’              </div>
   208â†’            </div>
   209â†’
   210â†’            {/* ä¸­é–“ï¼šç¸½ä»»å‹™æ•¸ + é¡åˆ¥é€²åº¦æ¢ */}
   211â†’            <div className="flex-1 space-y-4">
   212â†’              <div className="flex items-baseline gap-3 mb-6">
   213â†’                <span className="text-sm text-gray-500 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider">TOTAL_TASKS</span>
   214â†’                <span className="text-4xl font-black text-gray-900">{stats.total}</span>
   215â†’              </div>
   216â†’
   217â†’              {/* é¡åˆ¥é€²åº¦æ¢ */}
   218â†’              <div className="space-y-3">
   219â†’                {Object.entries(stats.byCategory).map(([category, data]) => {
   220â†’                  const colors = getColorForCategory(category);
   221â†’                  const progress = data.total > 0 ? (data.completed / data.total) * 100 : 0;
   222â†’                  const percentage = stats.total > 0 ? Math.round((data.total / stats.total) * 100) : 0;
   223â†’
   224â†’                  return (
   225â†’                    <div key={category} className="group">
   226â†’                      <div className="flex items-center gap-3 mb-1.5">
   227â†’                        <div className={`w-3 h-3 border border-gray-900 ${colors.bar}`} /> {/* Solid block */}
   228â†’                        <span className={`text-sm font-bold ${colors.text}`}>{category.toUpperCase()}</span>
   229â†’                        <span className="ml-auto text-sm text-gray-600">
   230â†’                          {data.total} ({percentage}%)
   231â†’                        </span>
   232â†’                      </div>
   233â†’                      <div className="h-2.5 bg-gray-200 border border-gray-400 overflow-hidden">
   234â†’                        <div
   235â†’                          className={`h-full ${colors.bar} transition-all duration-500`}
   236â†’                          style={{ width: `${progress}%` }}
   237â†’                        />
   238â†’                      </div>
   239â†’                    </div>
   240â†’                  );
   241â†’                })}
   242â†’              </div>
   243â†’            </div>
   244â†’
   245â†’            {/* å³å´ï¼šä»»å‹™ç‹€æ…‹åœ–ä¾‹ */}
   246â†’            <div className="lg:w-48 shrink-0">
   247â†’              <div className="retro-panel p-4">
   248â†’                <p className="text-xs text-gray-500 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider mb-3">TASK_STATUS</p>
   249â†’                <div className="space-y-2.5">
   250â†’                  <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   251â†’                    <div className="w-3 h-3 bg-emerald-500 border border-gray-900" />
   252â†’                    <span className="text-sm text-gray-700">COMPLETED</span>
   253â†’                    <span className="ml-auto text-sm font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.completed}</span>
   254â†’                  </div>
   255â†’                  <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   256â†’                    <div className="w-3 h-3 bg-blue-500 border border-gray-900" />
   257â†’                    <span className="text-sm text-gray-700">IN_PROGRESS</span>
   258â†’                    <span className="ml-auto text-sm font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.inProgress}</span>
   259â†’                  </div>
   260â†’                  <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   261â†’                    <div className="w-3 h-3 bg-gray-400 border border-gray-900" />
   262â†’                    <span className="text-sm text-gray-700">PENDING</span>
   263â†’                    <span className="ml-auto text-sm font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.pending}</span>
   264â†’                  </div>
   265â†’                </div>
   266â†’              </div>
   267â†’            </div>
   268â†’          </div>
   269â†’        )}
   270â†’      </Panel>
   271â†’
   272â†’      {/* Main Content Area */}
   273â†’      <div className="flex-1 min-h-[500px] flex flex-col relative z-10">
   274â†’         <div className="flex-1 h-full relative">
   275â†’            <AnimatePresence mode="wait">
   276â†’              {viewMode === 'gantt' && (
   277â†’                <motion.div
   278â†’                  key="gantt"
   279â†’                  initial={{ opacity: 0, x: -20 }}
   280â†’                  animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
   281â†’                  exit={{ opacity: 0, x: 20 }}
   282â†’                  className="absolute inset-0 pointer-events-auto"
   283â†’                >
   284â†’                  <GanttChart tasks={filteredTasks} onTaskClick={onOpenTask} />
   285â†’                </motion.div>
   286â†’              )}
   287â†’              {viewMode === 'list' && (
   288â†’                <motion.div
   289â†’                  key="list"
   290â†’                  initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
   291â†’                  animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
   292â†’                  exit={{ opacity: 0 }}
   293â†’                  className="absolute inset-0 retro-panel p-6 flex items-center justify-center pointer-events-auto"
   294â†’                >
   295â†’                  <div className="text-gray-700 font-medium">LIST_VIEW_INIT</div>
   296â†’                </motion.div>
   297â†’              )}
   298â†’            </AnimatePresence>
   299â†’         </div>
   300â†’      </div>
   301â†’    </motion.div>
   302â†’  );
   303â†’};
   304â†’
   305â†’// POC ç‹€æ…‹é…ç½®
   306â†’const POC_STATUS_CONFIG: Record<string, { label: string; color: string; bgColor: string }> = {
   307â†’  'pending': { label: 'PENDING', color: 'text-gray-600', bgColor: 'bg-gray-200' },
   308â†’  'in-progress': { label: 'IN_PROGRESS', color: 'text-blue-600', bgColor: 'bg-blue-200' },
   309â†’  'completed': { label: 'COMPLETED', color: 'text-emerald-600', bgColor: 'bg-emerald-200' },
   310â†’  'blocked': { label: 'BLOCKED', color: 'text-red-600', bgColor: 'bg-red-200' },
   311â†’};
   312â†’
   313â†’interface PocViewProps {
   314â†’  tasks: Task[];
   315â†’  isLoading: boolean;
   316â†’  onOpenTask: (task: Task | null) => void;
   317â†’  onDeleteTask: (taskId: string | number) => void;
   318â†’}
   319â†’
   320â†’const PocView = ({ tasks, isLoading, onOpenTask, onDeleteTask }: PocViewProps) => {
   321â†’  // åªé¡¯ç¤º POC ä»»å‹™ï¼ˆisPoc = trueï¼‰
   322â†’  const pocTasks = useMemo(() => tasks.filter(t => t.isPoc), [tasks]);
   323â†’
   324â†’  const handleNewPoc = () => {
   325â†’    // å»ºç«‹æ–°çš„ POC ææ¡ˆï¼ˆä¸éœ€è¦æ—¥æœŸï¼‰
   326â†’    const newPoc: Partial<Task> = {
   327â†’      name: '',
   328â†’      owner: '',
   329â†’      startDate: '',
   330â†’      endDate: '',
   331â†’      status: 'pending',
   332â†’      category: 'AIè³¦èƒ½',
   333â†’      progress: 0,
   334â†’      description: '',
   335â†’      materials: [],
   336â†’      isPoc: true,
   337â†’      stakeholders: [],
   338â†’    };
   339â†’    onOpenTask(newPoc as Task);
   340â†’  };
   341â†’
   342â†’  return (
   343â†’    <motion.div
   344â†’      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
   345â†’      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
   346â†’      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}
   347â†’      className="space-y-6 pb-32 pointer-events-auto"
   348â†’    >
   349â†’      {/* Header */}
   350â†’      <div className="flex items-center justify-between px-2 pr-16">
   351â†’        <div>
   352â†’          <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 tracking-tighter uppercase">DIAGNOSTIC // POC_PROTOCOL</h1>
   353â†’          <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mt-1">STATUS: EVALUATION_IN_PROGRESS</p>
   354â†’        </div>
   355â†’        <button
   356â†’          onClick={handleNewPoc}
   357â†’          className="retro-btn bg-fuchsia-500 text-white px-6 py-3 hover:bg-fuchsia-600"
   358â†’        >
   359â†’          <Plus className="w-5 h-5" />
   360â†’          <span>NEW_PROTOCOL</span>
   361â†’        </button>
   362â†’      </div>
   363â†’
   364â†’      {/* POC Cards Grid */}
   365â†’      {isLoading ? (
   366â†’        <div className="flex items-center justify-center py-20">
   367â†’          <Loader2 className="w-8 h-8 animate-spin text-gray-500" />
   368â†’          <span className="ml-3 text-gray-700 font-medium">LOADING_DATA...</span>
   369â†’        </div>
   370â†’      ) : pocTasks.length === 0 ? (
   371â†’        <div className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-20 retro-panel">
   372â†’          <div className="w-20 h-20 bg-gray-200 border-2 border-gray-900 flex items-center justify-center mb-4">
   373â†’            <FlaskConical className="w-10 h-10 text-gray-700" />
   374â†’          </div>
   375â†’          <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2 uppercase">NO_PROTOCOL_FOUND</h3>
   376â†’          <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4 text-sm">INITIATE_NEW_PROTOCOL_SEQUENCE_BELOW</p>
   377â†’          <button
   378â†’            onClick={handleNewPoc}
   379â†’            className="retro-btn bg-gray-700 text-white px-4 py-2 hover:bg-gray-900"
   380â†’          >
   381â†’            <Plus className="w-4 h-4" />
   382â†’            INITIATE
   383â†’          </button>
   384â†’        </div>
   385â†’      ) : (
   386â†’        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
   387â†’          {pocTasks.map(poc => {
   388â†’            const statusConfig = POC_STATUS_CONFIG[poc.status] || POC_STATUS_CONFIG['pending'];
   389â†’            const categoryColor = getColorForCategory(poc.category);
   390â†’
   391â†’            return (
   392â†’              <motion.div
   393â†’                key={poc.id}
   394â†’                whileHover={{ y: -4 }}
   395â†’                onClick={() => onOpenTask(poc)}
   396â†’                className="retro-panel p-0 overflow-hidden relative group cursor-pointer hover:shadow-lg transition-all"
   397â†’              >
   398â†’                {/* Delete Button */}
   399â†’                <button
   400â†’                  onClick={(e) => {
   401â†’                    e.stopPropagation();
   402â†’                    if (window.confirm('CONFIRM_DELETE_PROTOCOL?')) {
   403â†’                      onDeleteTask(poc.id);
   404â†’                    }
   405â†’                  }}
   406â†’                  className="retro-btn absolute top-3 right-3 p-1.5 bg-red-500 text-white hover:bg-red-600 z-10"
   407â†’                  title="DELETE_PROTOCOL"
   408â†’                >
   409â†’                  <Trash2 className="w-4 h-4" />
   410â†’                </button>
   411â†’
   412â†’                {/* Card Header */}
   413â†’                <div className={`h-2 ${categoryColor.bar}`} />
   414â†’
   415â†’                <div className="p-5 space-y-4">
   416â†’                  {/* Status & Category */}
   417â†’                  <div className="flex items-center gap-2 flex-wrap">
   418â†’                    <span className={`text-xs font-bold px-2.5 py-1 uppercase ${statusConfig.bgColor} ${statusConfig.color} border border-gray-900`}>
   419â†’                      {statusConfig.label}
   420â†’                    </span>
   421â†’                    <span className={`text-xs font-bold px-2.5 py-1 uppercase ${categoryColor.bg} ${categoryColor.text} border border-gray-900`}>
   422â†’                      {poc.category}
   423â†’                    </span>
   424â†’                  </div>
   425â†’
   426â†’                  {/* Title */}
   427â†’                  <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 group-hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors line-clamp-2 uppercase">
   428â†’                    {poc.name || 'UNNAMED_PROTOCOL'}
   429â†’                  </h3>
   430â†’
   431â†’                  {/* Description */}
   432â†’                  {poc.description && (
   433â†’                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-700 line-clamp-2">
   434â†’                      {poc.description}
   435â†’                    </p>
   436â†’                  )}
   437â†’
   438â†’                  {/* Owner */}
   439â†’                  <div className="flex items-center gap-3 pt-2 border-t border-gray-300">
   440â†’                    <div className="w-8 h-8 bg-black text-white text-xs font-bold flex items-center justify-center border border-gray-900">
   441â†’                      {poc.owner ? poc.owner.substring(0, 2).toUpperCase() : '??'}
   442â†’                    </div>
   443â†’                    <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
   444â†’                      <div className="text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 truncate">
   445â†’                        {poc.owner || 'UNKNOWN_AGENT'}
   446â†’                      </div>
   447â†’                      <div className="text-xs text-gray-600">AGENT</div>
   448â†’                    </div>
   449â†’
   450â†’                    {/* Materials Count */}
   451â†’                    {poc.materials && poc.materials.length > 0 && (
   452â†’                      <div className="flex items-center gap-1 text-gray-600">
   453â†’                        <LinkIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   454â†’                        <span className="text-xs font-medium">{poc.materials.length}</span>
   455â†’                      </div>
   456â†’                    )}
   457â†’                  </div>
   458â†’
   459â†’                  {/* Stakeholders */}
   460â†’                  {poc.stakeholders && poc.stakeholders.length > 0 && (
   461â†’                    <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   462â†’                      <span className="text-xs text-gray-600">STAKEHOLDERS:</span>
   463â†’                      <div className="flex -space-x-2">
   464â†’                        {poc.stakeholders.slice(0, 3).map((sh, i) => (
   465â†’                          <div
   466â†’                            key={sh.id || i}
   467â†’                            className="w-6 h-6 bg-gray-300 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold flex items-center justify-center border border-gray-900"
   468â†’                            title={`${sh.name} (${sh.role})`}
   469â†’                          >
   470â†’                            {sh.name.substring(0, 1)}
   471â†’                          </div>
   472â†’                        ))}
   473â†’                        {poc.stakeholders.length > 3 && (
   474â†’                          <div className="w-6 h-6 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 text-[10px] font-bold flex items-center justify-center border border-gray-900">
   475â†’                            +{poc.stakeholders.length - 3}
   476â†’                          </div>
   477â†’                        )}
   478â†’                      </div>
   479â†’                    </div>
   480â†’                  )}
   481â†’                </div>
   482â†’              </motion.div>
   483â†’            );
   484â†’          })}
   485â†’        </div>
   486â†’      )}
   487â†’    </motion.div>
   488â†’  );
   489â†’};
   490â†’
   491â†’// ============ å·²å®Œæˆå°ˆæ¡ˆé é¢ ============
   492â†’interface CompletedProjectsViewProps {
   493â†’  tasks: Task[];
   494â†’  isLoading: boolean;
   495â†’  onOpenTask: (task: Task | null) => void;
   496â†’  onDeleteTask: (taskId: string | number) => void;
   497â†’  people: string[];
   498â†’}
   499â†’
   500â†’const CompletedProjectsView = ({ tasks, isLoading, onOpenTask, onDeleteTask, people }: CompletedProjectsViewProps) => {
   501â†’  const [ownerFilter, setOwnerFilter] = useState<string>('all');
   502â†’
   503â†’  // æ‰€æœ‰å·²å®Œæˆçš„é POC ä»»å‹™
   504â†’  const allCompletedTasks = useMemo(() =>
   505â†’    tasks.filter(t => !t.isPoc && t.status === 'completed'),
   506â†’    [tasks]
   507â†’  );
   508â†’
   509â†’  // æ ¹æ“š owner ç¯©é¸ä¸¦æ’åº
   510â†’  const completedTasks = useMemo(() =>
   511â†’    filterTasksByOwner(allCompletedTasks, ownerFilter)
   512â†’      .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.endDate || 0).getTime() - new Date(a.endDate || 0).getTime()),
   513â†’    [allCompletedTasks, ownerFilter]
   514â†’  );
   515â†’
   516â†’  const formatDate = (dateStr?: string) => {
   517â†’    if (!dateStr) return '-';
   518â†’    const date = new Date(dateStr);
   519â†’    return `${date.getMonth() + 1}/${date.getDate()}`;
   520â†’  };
   521â†’
   522â†’  const calcDuration = (start?: string, end?: string) => {
   523â†’    if (!start || !end) return '-';
   524â†’    const startDate = new Date(start);
   525â†’    const endDate = new Date(end);
   526â†’    const diffTime = endDate.getTime() - startDate.getTime();
   527â†’    const diffDays = Math.ceil(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
   528â†’    return diffDays > 0 ? diffDays : 1;
   529â†’  };
   530â†’
   531â†’  const handleNewCompleted = () => {
   532â†’    const newTask: Partial<Task> = {
   533â†’      name: '',
   534â†’      owner: '',
   535â†’      startDate: '',
   536â†’      endDate: '',
   537â†’      status: 'completed',
   538â†’      category: 'AIè³¦èƒ½',
   539â†’      progress: 100,
   540â†’      description: '',
   541â†’      materials: [],
   542â†’      isPoc: false,
   543â†’    };
   544â†’    onOpenTask(newTask as Task);
   545â†’  };
   546â†’
   547â†’  return (
   548â†’    <motion.div
   549â†’      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
   550â†’      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
   551â†’      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}
   552â†’      className="space-y-6 pb-32 pointer-events-auto"
   553â†’    >
   554â†’      {/* Header */}
   555â†’      <div className="flex items-center justify-between px-2 pr-16">
   556â†’        <div>
   557â†’          <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 tracking-tighter uppercase">MISSION_LOG // COMPLETED_PROTOCOLS</h1>
   558â†’          <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mt-1">TOTAL_COMPLETED: {completedTasks.length}</p>
   559â†’        </div>
   560â†’        <button
   561â†’          onClick={handleNewCompleted}
   562â†’          className="retro-btn bg-emerald-500 text-white px-6 py-3 hover:bg-emerald-600"
   563â†’        >
   564â†’          <Plus className="w-5 h-5" />
   565â†’          <span>ADD_ENTRY</span>
   566â†’        </button>
   567â†’      </div>
   568â†’
   569â†’      {/* Owner Filter Tabs */}
   570â†’      <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 shrink-0 flex-wrap">
   571â†’        {['all', ...people].map((filter) => {
   572â†’          const isActive = ownerFilter === filter;
   573â†’          const count = filter === 'all'
   574â†’            ? allCompletedTasks.length
   575â†’            : allCompletedTasks.filter(t => (t.owner || '').toLowerCase() === filter.toLowerCase()).length;
   576â†’
   577â†’          // å‹•æ…‹é…è‰²
   578â†’          const colors = filter === 'all'
   579â†’            ? { bg: 'bg-gray-500', hover: 'hover:bg-gray-600' }
   580â†’            : { bg: 'bg-blue-500', hover: 'hover:bg-blue-600' };
   581â†’
   582â†’          return (
   583â†’            <button
   584â†’              key={filter}
   585â†’              onClick={() => setOwnerFilter(filter)}
   586â†’              className={`retro-btn relative px-5 py-2 text-sm text-white ${colors.bg} ${colors.hover} ${isActive ? 'bg-black' : ''}`}
   587â†’            >
   588â†’              {filter.toUpperCase()}
   589â†’              <span className={`ml-2 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs ${isActive ? 'bg-white text-black' : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-700'}`}>
   590â†’                {count}
   591â†’              </span>
   592â†’            </button>
   593â†’          );
   594â†’        })}
   595â†’      </div>
   596â†’
   597â†’      {/* Table */}
   598â†’      {isLoading ? (
   599â†’        <div className="flex items-center justify-center py-20">
   600â†’          <Loader2 className="w-8 h-8 animate-spin text-gray-500" />
   601â†’          <span className="ml-3 text-gray-700 font-medium">LOADING_DATA...</span>
   602â†’        </div>
   603â†’      ) : completedTasks.length === 0 ? (
   604â†’        <div className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-20 retro-panel">
   605â†’          <div className="w-20 h-20 bg-gray-200 border-2 border-gray-900 flex items-center justify-center mb-4">
   606â†’            <CheckCircle className="w-10 h-10 text-gray-700" />
   607â†’          </div>
   608â†’          <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2 uppercase">NO_COMPLETED_PROTOCOLS</h3>
   609â†’          <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm">ARCHIVE_EMPTY. AWAITING_COMPLETION_SIGNAL.</p>
   610â†’        </div>
   611â†’      ) : (
   612â†’        <div className="retro-panel overflow-hidden">
   613â†’          <table className="w-full">
   614â†’            <thead>
   615â†’              <tr className="bg-gray-100 border-b-2 border-gray-900">
   616â†’                <th className="text-left px-5 py-4 text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">PROTOCOL_NAME</th>
   617â†’                <th className="text-left px-4 py-4 text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">AGENT</th>
   618â†’                <th className="text-left px-4 py-4 text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">CATEGORY</th>
   619â†’                <th className="text-left px-4 py-4 text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">START_DATE</th>
   620â†’                <th className="text-left px-4 py-4 text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">END_DATE</th>
   621â†’                <th className="text-left px-4 py-4 text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">DURATION</th>
   622â†’                <th className="text-center px-4 py-4 text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">ACTIONS</th>
   623â†’              </tr>
   624â†’            </thead>
   625â†’            <tbody>
   626â†’              {completedTasks.map((task, idx) => {
   627â†’                const categoryColor = getColorForCategory(task.category);
   628â†’                return (
   629â†’                  <tr
   630â†’                    key={task.id}
   631â†’                    onClick={() => onOpenTask(task)}
   632â†’                    className={`border-b border-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer transition-colors ${idx % 2 === 0 ? 'bg-white' : 'bg-gray-50'}`}
   633â†’                  >
   634â†’                    <td className="px-5 py-4">
   635â†’                      <span className="font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">{task.name || 'UNNAMED'}</span>
   636â†’                    </td>
   637â†’                    <td className="px-4 py-4">
   638â†’                      <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   639â†’                        <div className="w-7 h-7 bg-black text-white text-xs font-bold flex items-center justify-center border border-gray-900">
   640â†’                          {task.owner ? task.owner.substring(0, 1) : '?'}
   641â†’                        </div>
   642â†’                        <span className="text-sm text-gray-800">{task.owner || 'UNKNOWN'}</span>
   643â†’                      </div>
   644â†’                    </td>
   645â†’                    <td className="px-4 py-4">
   646â†’                      <span className={`text-xs font-bold px-2.5 py-1 uppercase ${categoryColor.bg} ${categoryColor.text} border border-gray-900`}>
   647â†’                        {task.category || '-'}
   648â†’                      </span>
   649â†’                    </td>
   650â†’                    <td className="px-4 py-4 text-sm text-gray-700">{formatDate(task.startDate)}</td>
   651â†’                    <td className="px-4 py-4 text-sm text-gray-700">{formatDate(task.endDate)}</td>
   652â†’                    <td className="px-4 py-4">
   653â†’                      <span className="text-sm font-medium text-emerald-600">{calcDuration(task.startDate, task.endDate)} DAYS</span>
   654â†’                    </td>
   655â†’                    <td className="px-4 py-4 text-center">
   656â†’                      <button
   657â†’                        onClick={(e) => {
   658â†’                          e.stopPropagation();
   659â†’                          if (window.confirm('CONFIRM_DELETE_ENTRY?')) {
   660â†’                            onDeleteTask(task.id);
   661â†’                          }
   662â†’                        }}
   663â†’                        className="retro-btn bg-red-500 text-white p-2 hover:bg-red-600"
   664â†’                        title="DELETE_ENTRY"
   665â†’                      >
   666â†’                        <Trash2 className="w-4 h-4" />
   667â†’                      </button>
   668â†’                    </td>
   669â†’                  </tr>
   670â†’                );
   671â†’              })}
   672â†’            </tbody>
   673â†’          </table>
   674â†’        </div>
   675â†’      )}
   676â†’    </motion.div>
   677â†’  );
   678â†’};
   679â†’
   680â†’interface LearningViewProps {
   681â†’  tasks: Task[];
   682â†’  notes: LearningNote[];
   683â†’  isLoadingNotes: boolean;
   684â†’  onAddNote: (note: Omit<LearningNote, 'id' | 'createdAt' | 'updatedAt'>) => Promise<LearningNote>;
   685â†’  onUpdateNote: (note: LearningNote) => Promise<LearningNote>;
   686â†’  onDeleteNote: (noteId: string) => Promise<void>;
   687â†’}
   688â†’
   689â†’const LearningView = ({ tasks, notes, isLoadingNotes, onAddNote, onUpdateNote, onDeleteNote }: LearningViewProps) => {
   690â†’  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
   691â†’  const [editingNote, setEditingNote] = useState<Partial<LearningNote> | null>(null);
   692â†’  const [showProjectSelector, setShowProjectSelector] = useState(false);
   693â†’
   694â†’  // é™„ä»¶ç®¡ç†ç‹€æ…‹
   695â†’  const [newMaterial, setNewMaterial] = useState<{ type: Material['type']; name: string; url: string; note: string; dataUrl: string }>({
   696â†’    type: 'link',
   697â†’    name: '',
   698â†’    url: '',
   699â†’    note: '',
   700â†’    dataUrl: ''
   701â†’  });
   702â†’
   703â†’  const handleNewNote = () => {
   704â†’    setEditingNote({
   705â†’      title: '',
   706â†’      content: '',
   707â†’      relatedTaskIds: [],
   708â†’      materials: [],
   709â†’    });
   710â†’    setIsEditing(true);
   711â†’  };
   712â†’
   713â†’  const handleEditNote = (note: LearningNote) => {
   714â†’    setEditingNote({ ...note });
   715â†’    setIsEditing(true);
   716â†’  };
   717â†’
   718â†’  const handleSaveNote = async () => {
   719â†’    if (!editingNote?.title) {
   720â†’      alert('è«‹è¼¸å…¥ç­†è¨˜æ¨™é¡Œ');
   721â†’      return;
   722â†’    }
   723â†’
   724â†’    try {
   725â†’      if (editingNote.id) {
   726â†’        // æ›´æ–°ç¾æœ‰ç­†è¨˜
   727â†’        await onUpdateNote(editingNote as LearningNote);
   728â†’      } else {
   729â†’        // æ–°å¢ç­†è¨˜
   730â†’        await onAddNote({
   731â†’          title: editingNote.title || '',
   732â†’          content: editingNote.content || '',
   733â†’          relatedTaskIds: editingNote.relatedTaskIds || [],
   734â†’          materials: editingNote.materials || [],
   735â†’        });
   736â†’      }
   737â†’
   738â†’      setIsEditing(false);
   739â†’      setEditingNote(null);
   740â†’      setNewMaterial({ type: 'link', name: '', url: '', note: '', dataUrl: '' });
   741â†’    } catch (err) {
   742â†’      console.error('Failed to save note:', err);
   743â†’      alert('å„²å­˜å¤±æ•—ï¼Œè«‹ç¨å¾Œå†è©¦');
   744â†’    }
   745â†’  };
   746â†’
   747â†’  // é™„ä»¶ç®¡ç†å‡½æ•¸
   748â†’  const handleAddMaterial = () => {
   749â†’    if (!newMaterial.name || !editingNote) return;
   750â†’    const material: Material = {
   751â†’      id: Date.now().toString(),
   752â†’      type: newMaterial.type,
   753â†’      name: newMaterial.name,
   754â†’      url: newMaterial.url || undefined,
   755â†’      dataUrl: newMaterial.dataUrl || undefined,
   756â†’      note: newMaterial.note || undefined,
   757â†’    };
   758â†’    setEditingNote({
   759â†’      ...editingNote,
   760â†’      materials: [...(editingNote.materials || []), material]
   761â†’    });
   762â†’    setNewMaterial({ type: 'link', name: '', url: '', note: '', dataUrl: '' });
   763â†’  };
   764â†’
   765â†’  const handleDeleteMaterial = (materialId: string | number) => {
   766â†’    if (!editingNote) return;
   767â†’    setEditingNote({
   768â†’      ...editingNote,
   769â†’      materials: (editingNote.materials || []).filter(m => m.id !== materialId)
   770â†’    });
   771â†’  };
   772â†’
   773â†’  const handleDeleteNote = async (noteId: string) => {
   774â†’    if (window.confirm('ç¢ºå®šè¦åˆªé™¤é€™å‰‡ç­†è¨˜å—ï¼Ÿ')) {
   775â†’      try {
   776â†’        await onDeleteNote(noteId);
   777â†’      } catch (err) {
   778â†’        console.error('Failed to delete note:', err);
   779â†’        alert('åˆªé™¤å¤±æ•—ï¼Œè«‹ç¨å¾Œå†è©¦');
   780â†’      }
   781â†’    }
   782â†’  };
   783â†’
   784â†’  const handleToggleProject = (taskId: string) => {
   785â†’    if (!editingNote) return;
   786â†’    const current = editingNote.relatedTaskIds || [];
   787â†’    if (current.includes(taskId)) {
   788â†’      setEditingNote({ ...editingNote, relatedTaskIds: current.filter(id => id !== taskId) });
   789â†’    } else {
   790â†’      setEditingNote({ ...editingNote, relatedTaskIds: [...current, taskId] });
   791â†’    }
   792â†’  };
   793â†’
   794â†’  const getTaskById = (taskId: string) => tasks.find(t => String(t.id) === taskId);
   795â†’
   796â†’  // é POC çš„å°ˆæ¡ˆä»»å‹™
   797â†’  const projectTasks = useMemo(() => tasks.filter(t => !t.isPoc), [tasks]);
   798â†’
   799â†’  return (
   800â†’    <motion.div
   801â†’      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
   802â†’      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
   803â†’      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}
   804â†’      className="space-y-6 pb-32 pointer-events-auto"
   805â†’    >
   806â†’      {/* Header */}
   807â†’      <div className="flex items-center justify-between px-2 pr-16">
   808â†’        <div>
   809â†’          <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 tracking-tighter uppercase">KNOWLEDGE_BASE // LOG_ENTRIES</h1>
   810â†’          <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mt-1">RESEARCH_LOG_STATUS: OPERATIONAL</p>
   811â†’        </div>
   812â†’        <button
   813â†’          onClick={handleNewNote}
   814â†’          className="retro-btn bg-emerald-500 text-white px-6 py-3 hover:bg-emerald-600"
   815â†’        >
   816â†’          <Plus className="w-5 h-5" />
   817â†’          <span>NEW_ENTRY</span>
   818â†’        </button>
   819â†’      </div>
   820â†’
   821â†’      {/* Notes List or Empty State */}
   822â†’      {isLoadingNotes ? (
   823â†’        <div className="flex items-center justify-center py-20">
   824â†’          <Loader2 className="w-8 h-8 animate-spin text-gray-500" />
   825â†’          <span className="ml-3 text-gray-700 font-medium">LOADING_DATA...</span>
   826â†’        </div>
   827â†’      ) : notes.length === 0 && !isEditing ? (
   828â†’        <div className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-20 retro-panel">
   829â†’          <div className="w-20 h-20 bg-gray-200 border-2 border-gray-900 flex items-center justify-center mb-4">
   830â†’            <BookOpen className="w-10 h-10 text-gray-700" />
   831â†’          </div>
   832â†’          <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2 uppercase">NO_LOG_ENTRIES</h3>
   833â†’          <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4 text-sm text-center">CREATE_FIRST_LOG_ENTRY_BELOW</p>
   834â†’          <button
   835â†’            onClick={handleNewNote}
   836â†’            className="retro-btn bg-gray-700 text-white px-4 py-2 hover:bg-gray-900"
   837â†’          >
   838â†’            <Plus className="w-4 h-4" />
   839â†’            CREATE_ENTRY
   840â†’          </button>
   841â†’        </div>
   842â†’      ) : (
   843â†’        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
   844â†’          {/* Notes Panels */}
   845â†’          {notes.map(note => (
   846â†’            <motion.div
   847â†’              key={note.id}
   848â†’              whileHover={{ y: -2 }}
   849â†’              className="retro-panel overflow-hidden group"
   850â†’            >
   851â†’              <div className="p-5 space-y-3">
   852â†’                {/* Title & Actions */}
   853â†’                <div className="flex items-start justify-between gap-3">
   854â†’                  <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 flex-1 uppercase">{note.title}</h3>
   855â†’                  <div className="flex gap-1 shrink-0">
   856â†’                    <button
   857â†’                      onClick={() => handleEditNote(note)}
   858â†’                      className="retro-btn p-1.5 text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-100"
   859â†’                    >
   860â†’                      <FileText className="w-4 h-4" />
   861â†’                    </button>
   862â†’                    <button
   863â†’                      onClick={() => handleDeleteNote(note.id)}
   864â†’                      className="retro-btn p-1.5 text-gray-700 hover:text-red-600 hover:bg-red-100"
   865â†’                    >
   866â†’                      <Trash2 className="w-4 h-4" />
   867â†’                    </button>
   868â†’                  </div>
   869â†’                </div>
   870â†’
   871â†’                {/* Content Preview */}
   872â†’                {note.content && (
   873â†’                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-700 line-clamp-3 whitespace-pre-wrap">
   874â†’                    {note.content}
   875â†’                  </p>
   876â†’                )}
   877â†’
   878â†’                {/* Related Protocols */}
   879â†’                {note.relatedTaskIds.length > 0 && (
   880â†’                  <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 pt-2 border-t border-gray-300">
   881â†’                    <span className="text-xs text-gray-600 font-medium uppercase">RELATED_PROTOCOLS:</span>
   882â†’                    {note.relatedTaskIds.map(taskId => {
   883â†’                      const task = getTaskById(taskId);
   884â†’                      if (!task) return null;
   885â†’                      const colors = getColorForCategory(task.category);
   886â†’                      return (
   887â†’                        <span
   888â†’                          key={taskId}
   889â†’                          className={`text-xs font-bold px-2 py-0.5 uppercase ${colors.bg} ${colors.text} border border-gray-900`}
   890â†’                        >
   891â†’                          {task.name}
   892â†’                        </span>
   893â†’                      );
   894â†’                    })}
   895â†’                  </div>
   896â†’                )}
   897â†’
   898â†’                {/* Attachments Display */}
   899â†’                {note.materials && note.materials.length > 0 && (
   900â†’                  <div className="space-y-2 pt-2 border-t border-gray-300">
   901â†’                    <span className="text-xs text-gray-600 font-medium flex items-center gap-1 uppercase">
   902â†’                      <LinkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />ATTACHMENTS ({note.materials.length})
   903â†’                    </span>
   904â†’                    <div className="space-y-2">
   905â†’                      {note.materials.map(material => (
   906â†’                        <div key={material.id} className="flex items-center gap-2 p-2 retro-panel-inner">
   907â†’                          <div className={`w-6 h-6 border border-gray-900 flex items-center justify-center text-xs shrink-0
   908â†’                            ${material.type === 'link' ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' :
   909â†’                              material.type === 'image' ? 'bg-emerald-500 text-white' :
   910â†’                              material.type === 'video' ? 'bg-red-500 text-white' :
   911â†’                              material.type === 'note' ? 'bg-amber-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-500 text-white'}`}
   912â†’                          >
   913â†’                            {material.type === 'link' ? <LinkIcon className="w-3 h-3" /> :
   914â†’                             material.type === 'image' ? <ImageIcon className="w-3 h-3" /> :
   915â†’                             material.type === 'video' ? <PlayCircle className="w-3 h-3" /> :
   916â†’                             <FileText className="w-3 h-3" />}
   917â†’                          </div>
   918â†’                          <span className="text-xs font-medium text-gray-800 flex-1 truncate">{material.name}</span>
   919â†’                          {material.type === 'image' && material.dataUrl && (
   920â†’                            <img src={material.dataUrl} alt={material.name} className="w-8 h-8 object-cover border border-gray-900" />
   921â†’                          )}
   922â†’                          {material.url && (
   923â†’                            <a
   924â†’                              href={material.url}
   925â†’                              target="_blank"
   926â†’                              rel="noopener noreferrer"
   927â†’                              className="text-xs text-blue-600 hover:underline"
   928â†’                              onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}
   929â†’                            >
   930â†’                              OPEN
   931â†’                            </a>
   932â†’                          )}
   933â†’                        </div>
   934â†’                      ))}
   935â†’                    </div>
   936â†’                  </div>
   937â†’                )}
   938â†’
   939â†’                {/* Meta */}
   940â†’                <div className="text-xs text-gray-600 pt-2 uppercase">
   941â†’                  LAST_MODIFIED: {new Date(note.updatedAt).toLocaleDateString('zh-TW')}
   942â†’                </div>
   943â†’              </div>
   944â†’            </motion.div>
   945â†’          ))}
   946â†’        </div>
   947â†’      )}
   948â†’
   949â†’      {/* Note Editor Modal */}
   950â†’      <AnimatePresence>
   951â†’        {isEditing && editingNote && (
   952â†’          <motion.div
   953â†’            initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
   954â†’            animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
   955â†’            exit={{ opacity: 0 }}
   956â†’            className="fixed inset-0 bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-sm z-[80] flex items-center justify-center p-4"
   957â†’            onClick={() => { setIsEditing(false); setEditingNote(null); }}
   958â†’          >
   959â†’            <motion.div
   960â†’              initial={{ scale: 0.95, opacity: 0 }}
   961â†’              animate={{ scale: 1, opacity: 1 }}
   962â†’              exit={{ scale: 0.95, opacity: 0 }}
   963â†’              onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}
   964â†’              className="retro-panel w-full max-w-2xl max-h-[85vh] overflow-hidden flex flex-col"
   965â†’            >
   966â†’              {/* Editor Header */}
   967â†’              <div className="p-5 border-b-2 border-gray-900 flex items-center justify-between bg-gray-100">
   968â†’                <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase">
   969â†’                  {editingNote.id ? 'EDIT_LOG_ENTRY' : 'NEW_LOG_ENTRY'}
   970â†’                </h3>
   971â†’                <button
   972â†’                  onClick={() => { setIsEditing(false); setEditingNote(null); }}
   973â†’                  className="retro-btn p-2 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-200"
   974â†’                >
   975â†’                  <X className="w-5 h-5" />
   976â†’                </button>
   977â†’              </div>
   978â†’
   979â†’              {/* Editor Content */}
   980â†’              <div className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto p-5 space-y-5">
   981â†’                {/* Title */}
   982â†’                <div>
   983â†’                  <label className="text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 uppercase tracking-wider mb-2 block">
   984â†’                    TITLE
   985â†’                  </label>
   986â†’                  <input
   987â†’                    type="text"
   988â†’                    value={editingNote.title || ''}
   989â†’                    onChange={(e) => setEditingNote({ ...editingNote, title: e.target.value })}
   990â†’                    placeholder="ENTER_TITLE..."
   991â†’                    className="w-full px-4 py-3 border-2 border-gray-400 bg-white text-lg font-bold focus:outline-none focus:border-cyan-500 uppercase"
   992â†’                  />
   993â†’                </div>
   994â†’
   995â†’                {/* Related Protocols Selector */}
   996â†’                <div>
   997â†’                  <label className="text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 uppercase tracking-wider mb-2 block">
   998â†’                    RELATED_PROTOCOLS (REF)
   999â†’                  </label>
  1000â†’                  <div className="relative">
  1001â†’                    <button
  1002â†’                      onClick={() => setShowProjectSelector(!showProjectSelector)}
  1003â†’                      className="retro-btn w-full px-4 py-3 text-left flex items-center justify-between hover:border-gray-600"
  1004â†’                    >
  1005â†’                      <span className="text-gray-800 uppercase">
  1006â†’                        {(editingNote.relatedTaskIds?.length || 0) > 0

  1199â†’                              const file = e.target.files?.[0];
  1200â†’                              if (!file) return;
  1201â†’                              if (file.size > 5 * 1024 * 1024) {
  1202â†’                                alert('æª”æ¡ˆå¤§å°ä¸èƒ½è¶…é 5MB');
  1203â†’                                return;
  1204â†’                              }

  1207â†’                                setNewMaterial(prev => ({

  1209â†’                                  name: prev.name || file.name,
  1210â†’                                  dataUrl: reader.result as string,
  1211â†’                                  url: ''
  1212â†’                                }));
  1213â†’                              };
  1214â†’                              reader.readAsDataURL(file);
  1215â†’                              e.target.value = '';
  1216â†’                            }}

  1219â†’                        {newMaterial.dataUrl && (

  1225â†’                            >
  1226â†’                              <X className="w-3 h-3" />
  1227â†’                            </button>
  1228â†’                          </div>
  1229â†’                        )}
  1230â†’                      </div>
  1231â†’                    ) : newMaterial.type === 'file' ? (
  1232â†’                      <label className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 w-full py-2 bg-orange-50 border-2 border-dashed border-orange-300 text-orange-600 rounded-lg text-xs font-medium cursor-pointer hover:bg-orange-100 transition-colors">
  1233â†’                        <Upload className="w-4 h-4" />
  1234â†’                        ä¸Šå‚³æª”æ¡ˆ
  1235â†’                        <input
  1236â†’                          type="file"
  1237â†’                          className="hidden"

  1240â†’                            const file = e.target.files?.[0];
  1241â†’                            if (!file) return;

  1245â†’                            }
  1246â†’                            const reader = new FileReader();
  1247â†’                            reader.onload = () => {

  1250â†’                                name: prev.name || file.name,
  1251â†’                                dataUrl: reader.result as string
  1252â†’                              }));

  1257â†’                        />

  1259â†’                    ) : (
  1260â†’                      <input

  1274â†’                        (newMaterial.type === 'link' && !newMaterial.url) ||
  1275â†’                        (newMaterial.type === 'video' && !newMaterial.url) ||
  1276â†’                        (newMaterial.type === 'image' && !newMaterial.url && !newMaterial.dataUrl) ||
  1277â†’                        (newMaterial.type === 'file' && !newMaterial.dataUrl)
  1278â†’                      }
  1279â†’                      className="w-full py-2 bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-500 to-teal-500 text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-bold hover:opacity-90 transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center justify-center gap-2"

  1295â†’                  SAVE_ENTRY

  1300â†’                >
  1301â†’                  CANCEL
  1302â†’                </button>
  1303â†’              </div>
  1304â†’            </motion.div>
  1305â†’          </motion.div>

  1307â†’      </AnimatePresence>
  1308â†’    </motion.div>
  1309â†’  );
  1310â†’};
  1311â†’
  1312â†’type ViewType = 'active' | 'completed' | 'poc' | 'learning' | 'calendar';
  1313â†’
  1314â†’const AppV2 = () => {
  1315â†’  const [activeView, setActiveView] = useState<ViewType>('active');
  1316â†’  const [selectedTask, setSelectedTask] = useState<Task | null>(null);
  1317â†’  const [isPanelOpen, setIsPanelOpen] = useState(false);
  1318â†’  const [isSettingsOpen, setIsSettingsOpen] = useState(false);
  1319â†’
  1320â†’  // äººå“¡ç®¡ç†ç‹€æ…‹
  1321â†’  const [people, setPeople] = useState<string[]>(() => {
  1322â†’    const saved = localStorage.getItem('gantt-v2:people');
  1323â†’    return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : ['Ja', 'Jo'];
  1324â†’  });
  1325â†’  const [newPersonName, setNewPersonName] = useState('');
  1326â†’  const [editingPerson, setEditingPerson] = useState<string | null>(null);
  1327â†’  const [editingName, setEditingName] = useState('');
  1328â†’
  1329â†’  // é€£æ¥çœŸå¯¦å¾Œç«¯æ•¸æ“š
  1330â†’  const { tasks, isLoading, error, saveTasks, refetch } = useTasks();
  1331â†’  const { notes, isLoading: isLoadingNotes, addNote, updateNote, deleteNote } = useNotes();
  1332â†’
  1333â†’  // äººå“¡ç®¡ç†å‡½æ•¸
  1334â†’  const handleAddPerson = () => {
  1335â†’    const trimmed = newPersonName.trim();
  1336â†’    if (!trimmed || people.includes(trimmed)) return;
  1337â†’
  1338â†’    const updated = [...people, trimmed];
  1339â†’    setPeople(updated);
  1340â†’    localStorage.setItem('gantt-v2:people', JSON.stringify(updated));
  1341â†’    setNewPersonName('');
  1342â†’  };
  1343â†’
  1344â†’  const handleDeletePerson = (name: string) => {
  1345â†’    const updated = people.filter(p => p !== name);
  1346â†’    setPeople(updated);
  1347â†’    localStorage.setItem('gantt-v2:people', JSON.stringify(updated));
  1348â†’  };
  1349â†’
  1350â†’  const handleStartEdit = (person: string) => {
  1351â†’    setEditingPerson(person);
  1352â†’    setEditingName(person);
  1353â†’  };
  1354â†’
  1355â†’  const handleSaveEdit = async (oldName: string) => {
  1356â†’    const trimmed = editingName.trim();
  1357â†’
  1358â†’    // é©—è­‰ï¼šä¸èƒ½ç‚ºç©ºï¼Œä¸èƒ½èˆ‡ç¾æœ‰åç¨±é‡è¤‡ï¼ˆé™¤äº†è‡ªå·±ï¼‰
  1359â†’    if (!trimmed || (trimmed !== oldName && people.includes(trimmed))) {
  1360â†’      setEditingPerson(null);
  1361â†’      return;
  1362â†’    }
  1363â†’
  1364â†’    // å¦‚æœåç¨±æ²’æœ‰è®ŠåŒ–ï¼Œç›´æ¥å–æ¶ˆç·¨è¼¯
  1365â†’    if (trimmed === oldName) {
  1366â†’      setEditingPerson(null);
  1367â†’      return;
  1368â†’    }
  1369â†’
  1370â†’    // æ›´æ–° people åˆ—è¡¨
  1371â†’    const updatedPeople = people.map(p => p === oldName ? trimmed : p);
  1372â†’    setPeople(updatedPeople);
  1373â†’    localStorage.setItem('gantt-v2:people', JSON.stringify(updatedPeople));
  1374â†’
  1375â†’    // æ›´æ–°æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸é—œä»»å‹™çš„ owner
  1376â†’    const updatedTasks = tasks.map(task => {
  1377â†’      if (task.owner === oldName) {
  1378â†’        return { ...task, owner: trimmed };
  1379â†’      }
  1380â†’      return task;
  1381â†’    });
  1382â†’
  1383â†’    // ä¿å­˜åˆ°å¾Œç«¯
  1384â†’    await saveTasks(updatedTasks);
  1385â†’
  1386â†’    setEditingPerson(null);
  1387â†’  };
  1388â†’
  1389â†’  const handleCancelEdit = () => {
  1390â†’    setEditingPerson(null);
  1391â†’    setEditingName('');
  1392â†’  };
  1393â†’
  1394â†’  const handleOpenTask = (task: Task | null) => {
  1395â†’    setSelectedTask(task);
  1396â†’    setIsPanelOpen(true);
  1397â†’  };
  1398â†’
  1399â†’  const handleClosePanel = () => {
  1400â†’    setIsPanelOpen(false);
  1401â†’    setSelectedTask(null);
  1402â†’  };
  1403â†’
  1404â†’  const handleSaveTask = async (updatedTask: Task) => {
  1405â†’    const existingIndex = tasks.findIndex(t => t.id === updatedTask.id);
  1406â†’    let newTasks: Task[];
  1407â†’
  1408â†’    if (existingIndex >= 0) {
  1409â†’      // æ›´æ–°ç¾æœ‰ä»»å‹™
  1410â†’      newTasks = tasks.map(t => t.id === updatedTask.id ? updatedTask : t);
  1411â†’    } else {
  1412â†’      // æ–°å¢ä»»å‹™
  1413â†’      newTasks = [...tasks, { ...updatedTask, id: Date.now().toString() }];
  1414â†’    }

   312â†’
   313â†’    const newComment: TaskComment = {
   314â†’      id: Date.now().toString(),
   315â†’      author: commentAuthor.trim(),
   316â†’      content: commentContent.trim(),
   317â†’      createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
   318â†’    };
   319â†’
   320â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({
   321â†’      ...prev,
   322â†’      comments: [...(prev.comments || []), newComment]
   323â†’    }));
   324â†’
   325â†’    resetCommentForm();
   326â†’  };
   327â†’
   328â†’  const handleDeleteComment = (commentId: string) => {
   329â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({
   330â†’      ...prev,
   331â†’      comments: (prev.comments || []).filter(c => c.id !== commentId)
   332â†’    }));
   333â†’  };
   334â†’
   335â†’  const handleSave = () => {
   336â†’    if (!editedTask.name) {
   337â†’      alert('è«‹è¼¸å…¥ä»»å‹™åç¨±');
   338â†’      return;
   339â†’    }
   340â†’    onSave?.(editedTask as Task);
   341â†’  };
   342â†’
   343â†’  const handleAddCategory = (newCat: string) => {
   344â†’    if (!categories.includes(newCat)) {
   345â†’      const updated = [...categories, newCat];
   346â†’      setCategories(updated);
   347â†’      onCategoriesChange?.(updated.filter(c => !DEFAULT_CATEGORIES.includes(c)));
   348â†’    }
   349â†’  };
   350â†’
   351â†’  const handleAddOwner = (newOwner: string) => {
   352â†’    if (!owners.includes(newOwner)) {
   353â†’      setOwners(prev => [...prev, newOwner]);
   354â†’    }
   355â†’  };
   356â†’
   357â†’  const handleAddPerson = (newPerson: string) => {
   358â†’    if (!peopleOptions.includes(newPerson)) {
   359â†’      setPeopleOptions(prev => [...prev, newPerson]);
   360â†’    }
   361â†’  };
   362â†’
   363â†’  const getStakeholderNames = (): string[] => {
   364â†’    return (editedTask.stakeholders || []).map(s => s.name);
   365â†’  };
   366â†’
   367â†’  const updateStakeholders = (names: string[]) => {
   368â†’    const stakeholders = names.map(name => ({ id: name, name, role: '' }));
   369â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, stakeholders }));
   370â†’  };
   371â†’
   372â†’  const getStatusInfo = (statusValue: string) => {
   373â†’    const found = DEFAULT_STATUS_OPTIONS.find(s => s.value === statusValue || s.label === statusValue);
   374â†’    return found || { value: statusValue as TaskStatus, label: statusValue, color: 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-600' };
   375â†’  };
   376â†’
   377â†’  const getPriorityInfo = (priority?: TaskPriority) => {
   378â†’    return PRIORITY_OPTIONS.find(p => p.value === priority);
   379â†’  };
   380â†’
   381â†’  // é™„ä»¶ç®¡ç†
   382â†’  const handleAddMaterial = () => {
   383â†’    if (!materialName) return;
   384â†’
   385â†’    const material: Material = {
   386â†’      id: Date.now().toString(),
   387â†’      type: materialType,
   388â†’      name: materialName,
   389â†’      url: materialUrl || undefined,
   390â†’      dataUrl: materialDataUrl || undefined,
   391â†’      note: materialNote || undefined,
   392â†’    };
   393â†’
   394â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({
   395â†’      ...prev,
   396â†’      materials: [...(prev.materials || []), material]
   397â†’    }));
   398â†’
   399â†’    resetMaterialForm();
   400â†’  };
   401â†’
   402â†’  const handleDeleteMaterial = (materialId: string | number) => {
   403â†’    setEditedTask(prev => ({
   404â†’      ...prev,
   405â†’      materials: (prev.materials || []).filter(m => m.id !== materialId)
   406â†’    }));
   407â†’  };
   408â†’
   409â†’  const handleImageUpload = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
   410â†’    const file = e.target.files?.[0];
   411â†’    if (!file) return;
   412â†’    if (file.size > 5 * 1024 * 1024) {
   413â†’      alert('æª”æ¡ˆå¤§å°ä¸èƒ½è¶…é 5MB');
   414â†’      return;
   415â†’    }
   416â†’    const reader = new FileReader();
   417â†’    reader.onload = () => {
   418â†’      setMaterialDataUrl(reader.result as string);
   419â†’      if (!materialName) setMaterialName(file.name);
   420â†’    };
   421â†’    reader.readAsDataURL(file);
   422â†’    e.target.value = '';
   423â†’  };
   424â†’
   425â†’  const canAddMaterial = () => {
   426â†’    if (!materialName) return false;
   427â†’    if (materialType === 'note') return true;
   428â†’    if (materialType === 'image') return !!(materialUrl || materialDataUrl);
   429â†’    if (materialType === 'file') return !!materialDataUrl;
   430â†’    return !!materialUrl;
   431â†’  };
   432â†’
   433â†’  const currentStatus = getStatusInfo(editedTask.status || 'pending');
   434â†’  const currentPriority = getPriorityInfo(editedTask.priority);
   435â†’
   436â†’  return (
   437â†’    <>
   438â†’      {isOpen && (
   439â†’        <motion.div
   440â†’          initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
   441â†’          animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
   442â†’          exit={{ opacity: 0 }}
   443â†’          onClick={onClose}
   444â†’          className="fixed inset-0 bg-slate-900/20 backdrop-blur-sm z-[60]"
   445â†’        />
   446â†’      )}
   447â†’
   448â†’      <motion.div
   449â†’        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
   450â†’        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
   451â†’        transition={{ type: 'spring', damping: 25, stiffness: 200 }}
   452â†’        className="fixed top-0 right-0 bottom-0 w-full md:w-[480px] bg-white/95 backdrop-blur-2xl border-l border-white/50 shadow-2xl z-[70] flex flex-col"
   453â†’      >
   454â†’        {/* Header */}
   455â†’        <div className="p-4 border-b border-slate-100 bg-white/80">
   456â†’          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-3">
   457â†’            <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5">
   458â†’              {/* å„ªå…ˆç´š */}
   459â†’              <Select
   460â†’                value={currentPriority?.label || 'å„ªå…ˆç´š'}
   461â†’                options={PRIORITY_OPTIONS.map(p => p.label)}
   462â†’                onChange={(val) => {
   463â†’                  const found = PRIORITY_OPTIONS.find(p => p.label === val);
   464â†’                  if (found) setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, priority: found.value }));
   465â†’                }}
   466â†’              />
   467â†’              {/* é¡åˆ¥ */}
   468â†’              <Select
   469â†’                value={editedTask.category || ''}
   470â†’                options={categories}
   471â†’                onChange={(val) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, category: val }))}
   472â†’                onAddOption={handleAddCategory}
   473â†’                placeholder="é¡åˆ¥"
   474â†’              />
   475â†’              {/* ç‹€æ…‹ */}
   476â†’              <Select
   477â†’                value={currentStatus.label}
   478â†’                options={statuses}
   479â†’                onChange={(val) => {
   480â†’                  const found = DEFAULT_STATUS_OPTIONS.find(s => s.label === val);
   481â†’                  setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, status: found ? found.value : val as TaskStatus }));
   482â†’                }}
   483â†’                placeholder="ç‹€æ…‹"
   484â†’              />
   485â†’            </div>
   486â†’            <div className="flex items-center gap-1">
   487â†’              {task?.id && onDelete && (
   488â†’                <button
   489â†’                  onClick={() => {
   490â†’                    if (window.confirm('ç¢ºå®šè¦åˆªé™¤æ­¤ä»»å‹™å—ï¼Ÿ')) {
   491â†’                      onDelete(task.id);
   492â†’                      onClose();
   493â†’                    }
   494â†’                  }}
   495â†’                  className="p-2 hover:bg-red-100 rounded-full text-slate-400 hover:text-red-500 shrink-0 transition-colors"
   496â†’                  title="åˆªé™¤ä»»å‹™"
   497â†’                >
   498â†’                  <Trash2 className="w-5 h-5" />
   499â†’                </button>
   500â†’              )}
   501â†’              <button onClick={onClose} className="p-2 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-full text-slate-400 hover:text-slate-600 shrink-0">
   502â†’                <X className="w-5 h-5" />
   503â†’              </button>
   504â†’            </div>
   505â†’          </div>
   506â†’
   507â†’          {/* æ¨™é¡Œ */}
   508â†’          <input
   509â†’            type="text"
   510â†’            value={editedTask.name || ''}
   511â†’            onChange={(e) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, name: e.target.value }))}
   512â†’            placeholder="ä»»å‹™åç¨±"
   513â†’            className="text-xl font-black text-slate-800 bg-transparent border-b-2 border-transparent hover:border-slate-200 focus:border-pink-400 outline-none w-full pb-1 transition-colors"
   514â†’          />
   515â†’        </div>
   516â†’
   517â†’        {/* Content */}
   518â†’        <div className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto p-5 space-y-5">
   519â†’
   520â†’          {/* è² è²¬äºº & é€²åº¦ */}
   521â†’          <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4">
   522â†’            <div>
   523â†’              <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-1.5 block">
   524â†’                <User className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />è² è²¬äºº
   525â†’              </label>
   526â†’              <Select
   527â†’                value={editedTask.owner || ''}
   528â†’                options={owners}
   529â†’                onChange={(val) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, owner: val }))}
   530â†’                onAddOption={handleAddOwner}
   531â†’                placeholder="é¸æ“‡æˆ–è¼¸å…¥"
   532â†’              />
   533â†’            </div>
   534â†’            <div>
   535â†’              <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-1.5 block">
   536â†’                <Tag className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />é€²åº¦
   537â†’              </label>
   538â†’              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   539â†’                <input
   540â†’                  type="range"
   541â†’                  min="0"
   542â†’                  max="100"
   543â†’                  value={editedTask.progress || 0}
   544â†’                  onChange={(e) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, progress: parseInt(e.target.value) }))}
   545â†’                  className="flex-1 h-2 bg-slate-200 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer accent-pink-500"
   546â†’                />
   547â†’                <span className="text-sm font-bold text-pink-500 w-12 text-right">{editedTask.progress || 0}%</span>
   548â†’              </div>
   549â†’            </div>
   550â†’          </div>
   551â†’
   552â†’          {/* ç›¸é—œäºº */}
   553â†’          <div>
   554â†’            <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-2 block">
   555â†’              <User className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />ç›¸é—œäºº
   556â†’            </label>
   557â†’            <MultiSelectPeople
   558â†’              value={getStakeholderNames()}
   559â†’              options={peopleOptions}
   560â†’              onChange={updateStakeholders}
   561â†’              onAddOption={handleAddPerson}
   562â†’            />
   563â†’          </div>
   564â†’
   565â†’          {/* æ—¥æœŸç¯„åœ (é POC) */}
   566â†’          {!editedTask.isPoc && (
   567â†’            <div>
   568â†’              <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-2 block">
   569â†’                <Calendar className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />æ—¥æœŸç¯„åœ
   570â†’              </label>
   571â†’              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   572â†’                <input
   573â†’                  type="date"
   574â†’                  value={editedTask.startDate || ''}
   575â†’                  onChange={(e) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, startDate: e.target.value }))}
   576â†’                  className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 rounded-xl border border-slate-200 text-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-pink-300 outline-none"
   577â†’                />
   578â†’                <span className="text-slate-400">~</span>
   579â†’                <input
   580â†’                  type="date"
   581â†’                  value={editedTask.endDate || ''}
   582â†’                  onChange={(e) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, endDate: e.target.value }))}
   583â†’                  className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 rounded-xl border border-slate-200 text-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-pink-300 outline-none"
   584â†’                />
   585â†’              </div>
   586â†’            </div>
   587â†’          )}
   588â†’
   589â†’          {/* æè¿° */}
   590â†’          <div>
   591â†’            <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-1.5 block">
   592â†’              <Tag className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />æè¿°
   593â†’            </label>
   594â†’            <textarea
   595â†’              value={editedTask.description || ''}
   596â†’              onChange={(e) => setEditedTask(prev => ({ ...prev, description: e.target.value }))}
   597â†’              rows={3}
   598â†’              placeholder="è¼¸å…¥æè¿°..."
   599â†’              className="w-full px-3 py-2 rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-pink-300 outline-none text-sm resize-none"
   600â†’            />
   601â†’          </div>
   602â†’
   603â†’          {/* å‚™è¨»/æ„è¦‹ */}
   604â†’          <div>
   605â†’            <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-2 block">
   606â†’              <MessageCircle className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />å‚™è¨»/æ„è¦‹
   607â†’            </label>
   608â†’
   609â†’            {/* ç¾æœ‰å‚™è¨»åˆ—è¡¨ */}
   610â†’            {(editedTask.comments || []).length > 0 && (
   611â†’              <div className="space-y-2 mb-3">
   612â†’                {(editedTask.comments || []).map(comment => (
   613â†’                  <div key={comment.id} className="p-3 bg-amber-50/50 rounded-xl border border-amber-100">
   614â†’                    <div className="flex items-start justify-between gap-2">
   615â†’                      <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
   616â†’                        <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-1">
   617â†’                          <span className="px-2 py-0.5 bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 rounded-full text-xs font-bold">
   618â†’                            {comment.author}
   619â†’                          </span>
   620â†’                          <span className="text-[10px] text-slate-400">
   621â†’                            {new Date(comment.createdAt).toLocaleDateString('zh-TW')}
   622â†’                          </span>
   623â†’                        </div>
   624â†’                        <p className="text-sm text-slate-600 whitespace-pre-wrap">{comment.content}</p>
   625â†’                      </div>
   626â†’                      <button
   627â†’                        onClick={() => handleDeleteComment(comment.id)}
   628â†’                        className="p-1 text-slate-300 hover:text-red-500 hover:bg-red-50 rounded-lg transition-all shrink-0"
   629â†’                      >
   630â†’                        <Trash2 className="w-3.5 h-3.5" />
   631â†’                      </button>
   632â†’                    </div>
   633â†’                  </div>
   634â†’                ))}
   635â†’              </div>
   636â†’            )}
   637â†’
   638â†’            {/* æ–°å¢å‚™è¨»è¡¨å–® */}
   639â†’            <div className="p-3 bg-slate-50 rounded-xl border border-dashed border-slate-200 space-y-2">
   640â†’              <input
   641â†’                type="text"
   642â†’                placeholder="ä½ çš„åå­—"
   643â†’                value={commentAuthor}
   644â†’                onChange={(e) => setCommentAuthor(e.target.value)}
   645â†’                className="w-full px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-slate-200 text-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-amber-300 outline-none"
   646â†’              />
   647â†’              <textarea
   648â†’                placeholder="è¼¸å…¥å‚™è¨»å…§å®¹..."

   652â†’                className="w-full px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-slate-200 text-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-amber-300 outline-none resize-none"
   653â†’              />
   654â†’              <button
   655â†’                onClick={handleAddComment}
   656â†’                disabled={!commentAuthor.trim() || !commentContent.trim()}
   657â†’                className="w-full py-2 bg-gradient-to-r from-amber-400 to-orange-400 text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-bold hover:opacity-90 transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
   658â†’              >
   659â†’                <Plus className="w-4 h-4" />
   660â†’                æ–°å¢å‚™è¨»
   661â†’              </button>
   662â†’            </div>
   663â†’          </div>
   664â†’
   665â†’          {/* é™„ä»¶è³‡æº */}
   666â†’          <div>
   667â†’            <label className="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-wider mb-2 block">
   668â†’              <LinkIcon className="w-3 h-3 inline mr-1" />é™„ä»¶è³‡æº
   669â†’            </label>
   670â†’
   671â†’            {/* ç¾æœ‰é™„ä»¶ - æ‰€æœ‰éƒ½å¯é»æ“Š */}
   672â†’            <div className="space-y-2 mb-3">
   673â†’              {(editedTask.materials || []).map(material => {
   674â†’                const imageUrl = material.dataUrl || material.url;
   675â†’                const isImage = material.type === 'image';
   676â†’                const hasLink = material.url;
   677â†’
   678â†’                return (
   679â†’                  <div key={material.id} className="retro-panel-inner overflow-hidden group hover:border-blue-600 transition-all">
   680â†’                    {/* åœ–ç‰‡å¤§åœ– - é»æ“Šæ”¾å¤§ */}
   681â†’                    {isImage && imageUrl && (
   682â†’                      <button onClick={() => setLightboxImage(imageUrl)} className="block w-full">
   683â†’                        <img src={imageUrl} alt={material.name} className="w-full h-32 object-cover hover:opacity-90 cursor-zoom-in border-b border-gray-300" />
   684â†’                      </button>
   685â†’                    )}
   686â†’
   687â†’                    <div className="flex items-center gap-3 p-3">
   688â†’                      <div className={`w-8 h-8 border border-gray-900 flex items-center justify-center shrink-0 ${
   689â†’                        material.type === 'link' ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' :
   690â†’                        material.type === 'image' ? 'bg-emerald-500 text-white' :
   691â†’                        material.type === 'video' ? 'bg-red-500 text-white' :
   692â†’                        material.type === 'note' ? 'bg-fuchsia-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-500 text-white'
   693â†’                      }`}>
   694â†’                        {material.type === 'link' ? <LinkIcon className="w-4 h-4" /> :
   695â†’                         material.type === 'image' ? <ImageIcon className="w-4 h-4" /> :
   696â†’                         material.type === 'video' ? <PlayCircle className="w-4 h-4" /> :
   697â†’                         <FileText className="w-4 h-4" />}
   698â†’                      </div>
   699â†’
   700â†’                      <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
   701â†’                        {hasLink ? (
   702â†’                          <a href={material.url} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" className="text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 hover:text-blue-600 truncate block uppercase">
   703â†’                            {material.name}
   704â†’                          </a>
   705â†’                        ) : (
   706â†’                          <div className="text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 truncate uppercase">{material.name}</div>
   707â†’                        )}
   708â†’                        {material.url && <div className="text-xs text-gray-600 truncate">{material.url}</div>}
   709â†’                        {material.note && <div className="text-xs text-gray-700 mt-1">{material.note}</div>}
   710â†’                      </div>
   711â†’
   712â†’                      {hasLink && (
   713â†’                        <a href={material.url} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" className="retro-btn p-1.5 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-300">
   714â†’                          <ExternalLink className="w-4 h-4" />
   715â†’                        </a>
   716â†’                      )}
   717â†’
   718â†’                      <button
   719â†’                        onClick={() => handleDeleteMaterial(material.id)}
   720â†’                        className="retro-btn p-1.5 text-gray-700 hover:text-red-600 hover:bg-red-100"
   721â†’                      >
   722â†’                        <Trash2 className="w-4 h-4" />
   723â†’                      </button>
   724â†’                    </div>
   725â†’                  </div>
   726â†’                );
   727â†’              })}
   728â†’            </div>
   729â†’
   730â†’                        {/* æ–°å¢é™„ä»¶è¡¨å–® */}
   731â†’                        <div className="space-y-3 p-3 bg-gray-100 border-2 border-dashed border-gray-400">
   732â†’                          {/* é¡å‹é¸æ“‡ */}
   733â†’                          <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
   734â†’                            {[
   735â†’                              { type: 'link', label: 'LINK', icon: LinkIcon, color: 'bg-blue-500' },
   736â†’                              { type: 'image', label: 'IMAGE', icon: ImageIcon, color: 'bg-emerald-500' },
   737â†’                              { type: 'file', label: 'FILE', icon: FileText, color: 'bg-amber-500' },
   738â†’                              { type: 'note', label: 'NOTE', icon: FileText, color: 'bg-fuchsia-500' },
   739â†’                              { type: 'video', label: 'VIDEO', icon: PlayCircle, color: 'bg-red-500' },
   740â†’                            ].map(item => (
   741â†’                              <button
   742â†’                                key={item.type}
   743â†’                                onClick={() => setMaterialType(item.type as Material['type'])}
   744â†’                                className={`retro-btn flex items-center gap-1 px-2.5 py-1.5 text-xs uppercase ${
   745â†’                                  materialType === item.type
   746â†’                                    ? `${item.color} text-white`
   747â†’                                    : 'bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100'
   748â†’                                }`}
